english: then turned his back ˹on the truth˺ and acted arrogantly,

codes: ﭩ ﭪ ﭫ ﭬ ﭭ ﭮ ﭯ
text: فَقَالَ إِنْ هَٰذَا إِلَّا سِحْرٌ يُؤْثَرُ
english: saying, “This ˹Quran˺ is nothing but magic from the ancients.

codes: ﭰ ﭱ ﭲ ﭳ ﭴ ﭵ
text: إِنْ هَٰذَا إِلَّا قَوْلُ الْبَشَرِ
english: This is no more than the word of a man.”

codes: ﭶ ﭷ ﭸ
text: سَأُصْلِيهِ سَقَرَ
english: Soon I will burn him in Hell!

codes: ﭹ ﭺ ﭻ ﭼ ﭽ
text: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا سَقَرُ
english: And what will make you realize what Hell is?

codes: ﭾ ﭿ ﮀ ﮁ ﮂ
text: لَا تُبْقِي وَلَا تَذَرُ
english: It does not let anyone live or die,

codes: ﮃ ﮄ ﮅ
text: لَوَّاحَةٌ لِّلْبَشَرِ
english: scorching the skin.

codes: ﮆ ﮇ ﮈ ﮉ
text: عَلَيْهَا تِسْعَةَ عَشَرَ
english: It is overseen by nineteen ˹keepers˺.

codes: ﮊ ﮋ ﮌ ﮍ ﮎ ﮏ ﮐ ﮑ ﮒ ﮓ ﮔ ﮕ ﮖ ﮗ ﮘ ﮙ ﮚ ﮛ ﮜ ﮝ ﮞ ﮟ ﮠ ﮡ ﮢ ﮣ ﮤ ﮥ ﮦ ﮧ ﮨ ﮩ ﮪ ﮫ ﮬ ﮭ ﮮ ﮯ ﮰ ﮱ ﯓ ﯔ ﯕ ﯖ ﯗ ﯘ ﯙ ﯚ ﯛ ﯜ ﯝ ﯞ ﯟ ﯠ ﯡ ﯢ ﯣ ﯤ ﯥ ﯦ ﯧ ﯨ ﯩ ﯪ
text: وَمَا جَعَلْنَا أَصْحَابَ النَّارِ إِلَّا مَلَائِكَةً ۙ وَمَا جَعَلْنَا عِدَّتَهُمْ إِلَّا فِتْنَةً لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لِيَسْتَيْقِنَ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ وَيَزْدَادَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِيمَانًا ۙ وَلَا يَرْتَابَ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ وَالْمُؤْمِنُونَ ۙ وَلِيَقُولَ الَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ وَالْكَافِرُونَ مَاذَا أَرَادَ اللَّهُ بِهَٰذَا مَثَلًا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُضِلُّ اللَّهُ مَن يَشَاءُ وَيَهْدِي مَن يَشَاءُ ۚ وَمَا يَعْلَمُ جُنُودَ رَبِّكَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ وَمَا هِيَ إِلَّا ذِكْرَىٰ لِلْبَشَرِ
english: We have appointed only ˹stern˺ angels as wardens of the Fire. And We have made their number only as a test for the disbelievers, so that the People of the Book will be certain, and the believers will increase in faith, and neither the People of the Book nor the believers will have any doubts, and so that those ˹hypocrites˺ with sickness in their hearts and the disbelievers will argue, “What does Allah mean by such a number?” In this way Allah leaves whoever He wills to stray and guides whoever He wills. And none knows the forces of your Lord except He. And this ˹description of Hell˺ is only a reminder to humanity.

codes: ﯫ ﯬ ﯭ
text: كَلَّا وَالْقَمَرِ
english: But no! By the moon,

codes: ﯮ ﯯ ﯰ ﯱ
text: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذْ أَدْبَرَ
english: and the night as it retreats,

codes: ﯲ ﯳ ﯴ ﯵ
text: وَالصُّبْحِ إِذَا أَسْفَرَ
english: and the day as it breaks!

codes: ﯶ ﯷ ﯸ ﯹ
text: إِنَّهَا لَإِحْدَى الْكُبَرِ
english: Surely Hell is one of the mightiest catastrophes—

codes: ﯺ ﯻ ﯼ
text: نَذِيرًا لِّلْبَشَرِ
english: a warning to humankind,

codes: ﯽ ﯾ ﯿ ﰀ ﰁ ﰂ ﰃ ﰄ
text: لِمَن شَاءَ مِنكُمْ أَن يَتَقَدَّمَ أَوْ يَتَأَخَّرَ
english: to whichever of you chooses to take the lead or lag behind.

codes: ﰅ ﰆ ﰇ ﰈ ﰉ ﰊ
text: كُلُّ نَفْسٍ بِمَا كَسَبَتْ رَهِينَةٌ
english: Every soul will be detained for what it has done,

codes: ﰋ ﰌ ﰍ ﰎ
text: إِلَّا أَصْحَابَ الْيَمِينِ
english: except the people of the right,

codes: ﰏ ﰐ ﰑ ﰒ
text: فِي جَنَّاتٍ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ
english: who will be in Gardens, asking one another

codes: ﰓ ﰔ ﰕ
text: عَنِ الْمُجْرِمِينَ
english: about the wicked ˹who will then be asked˺:

codes: ﰖ ﰗ ﰘ ﰙ ﰚ
text: مَا سَلَكَكُمْ فِي سَقَرَ
english: “What has landed you in Hell?”

codes: ﰛ ﰜ ﰝ ﰞ ﰟ ﰠ
text: قَالُوا لَمْ نَكُ مِنَ الْمُصَلِّينَ
english: They will reply, “We were not of those who prayed,

codes: ﰡ ﰢ ﰣ ﰤ ﰥ
text: وَلَمْ نَكُ نُطْعِمُ الْمِسْكِينَ
english: nor did we feed the poor.

codes: ﰦ ﰧ ﰨ ﰩ ﰪ
text: وَكُنَّا نَخُوضُ مَعَ الْخَائِضِينَ
english: We used to indulge ˹in falsehood˺ along with others,

codes: ﰫ ﰬ ﰭ ﰮ ﰯ
text: وَكُنَّا نُكَذِّبُ بِيَوْمِ الدِّينِ
english: and deny the Day of Judgment,

codes: ﰰ ﰱ ﰲ ﰳ
text: حَتَّىٰ أَتَانَا الْيَقِينُ
english: until the inevitable came to us.”

codes: ﭑ ﭒ ﭓ ﭔ ﭕ
text: فَمَا تَنفَعُهُمْ شَفَاعَةُ الشَّافِعِينَ
english: So the pleas of intercessors will be of no benefit to them.

codes: ﭖ ﭗ ﭘ ﭙ ﭚ ﭛ
text: فَمَا لَهُمْ عَنِ التَّذْكِرَةِ مُعْرِضِينَ
english: Now, what is the matter with them that they are turning away from the reminder,

codes: ﭜ ﭝ ﭞ ﭟ
text: كَأَنَّهُمْ حُمُرٌ مُّسْتَنفِرَةٌ
english: as if they were spooked zebras

codes: ﭠ ﭡ ﭢ ﭣ
text: فَرَّتْ مِن قَسْوَرَةٍ
english: fleeing from a lion?

codes: ﭤ ﭥ ﭦ ﭧ ﭨ ﭩ ﭪ ﭫ ﭬ ﭭ
text: بَلْ يُرِيدُ كُلُّ امْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ أَن يُؤْتَىٰ صُحُفًا مُّنَشَّرَةً
english: In fact, each one of them wishes to be given a ˹personal˺ letter ˹from Allah˺ for all ˹to read˺.

codes: ﭮ ﭯ ﭰ ﭱ ﭲ ﭳ ﭴ
text: كَلَّا ۖ بَل لَّا يَخَافُونَ الْآخِرَةَ
english: But no! In fact, they do not fear the Hereafter.

codes: ﭵ ﭶ ﭷ ﭸ
text: كَلَّا إِنَّهُ تَذْكِرَةٌ
english: Enough! Surely this ˹Quran˺ is a reminder.

codes: ﭹ ﭺ ﭻ ﭼ
text: فَمَن شَاءَ ذَكَرَهُ
english: So let whoever wills be mindful of it.

codes: ﭽ ﭾ ﭿ ﮀ ﮁ ﮂ ﮃ ﮄ ﮅ ﮆ ﮇ ﮈ ﮉ
text: وَمَا يَذْكُرُونَ إِلَّا أَن يَشَاءَ اللَّهُ ۚ هُوَ أَهْلُ التَّقْوَىٰ وَأَهْلُ الْمَغْفِرَةِ
english: But they cannot do so unless Allah wills. He ˹alone˺ is worthy to be feared and entitled to forgive.

codes: ﮊ ﮋ ﮌ ﮍ ﮎ
text: لَا أُقْسِمُ بِيَوْمِ الْقِيَامَةِ
english: I do swear by the Day of Judgment!

codes: ﮏ ﮐ ﮑ ﮒ ﮓ
text: وَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِالنَّفْسِ اللَّوَّامَةِ
english: And I do swear by the self-reproaching soul!

codes: ﮔ ﮕ ﮖ ﮗ ﮘ ﮙ
text: أَيَحْسَبُ الْإِنسَانُ أَلَّن نَّجْمَعَ عِظَامَهُ
english: Do people think We cannot reassemble their bones?

codes: ﮚ ﮛ ﮜ ﮝ ﮞ ﮟ ﮠ
text: بَلَىٰ قَادِرِينَ عَلَىٰ أَن نُّسَوِّيَ بَنَانَهُ
english: Yes ˹indeed˺! We are ˹most˺ capable of restoring ˹even˺ their very fingertips.

codes: ﮡ ﮢ ﮣ ﮤ ﮥ ﮦ
text: بَلْ يُرِيدُ الْإِنسَانُ لِيَفْجُرَ أَمَامَهُ
english: Still people want to deny what is yet to come,

codes: ﮧ ﮨ ﮩ ﮪ ﮫ
text: يَسْأَلُ أَيَّانَ يَوْمُ الْقِيَامَةِ
english: asking ˹mockingly˺, “When is this Day of Judgment?”

codes: ﮬ ﮭ ﮮ ﮯ
text: فَإِذَا بَرِقَ الْبَصَرُ
english: But when the sight is stunned,

codes: ﮰ ﮱ ﯓ
text: وَخَسَفَ الْقَمَرُ
english: and the moon is dimmed,

codes: ﯔ ﯕ ﯖ ﯗ
text: وَجُمِعَ الشَّمْسُ وَالْقَمَرُ
english: and the sun and the moon are brought together,

codes: ﯘ ﯙ ﯚ ﯛ ﯜ ﯝ
text: يَقُولُ الْإِنسَانُ يَوْمَئِذٍ أَيْنَ الْمَفَرُّ
english: on that Day one will cry, “Where is the escape?”

codes: ﯞ ﯟ ﯠ ﯡ
text: كَلَّا لَا وَزَرَ
english: But no! There will be no refuge.

codes: ﯢ ﯣ ﯤ ﯥ ﯦ
text: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ الْمُسْتَقَرُّ
english: On that Day all will end up before your Lord.

codes: ﯧ ﯨ ﯩ ﯪ ﯫ ﯬ ﯭ
text: يُنَبَّأُ الْإِنسَانُ يَوْمَئِذٍ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ
english: All will then be informed of what they have sent forth and left behind.

codes: ﯮ ﯯ ﯰ ﯱ ﯲ ﯳ
text: بَلِ الْإِنسَانُ عَلَىٰ نَفْسِهِ بَصِيرَةٌ
english: In fact, people will testify against their own souls,

codes: ﯴ ﯵ ﯶ ﯷ
text: وَلَوْ أَلْقَىٰ مَعَاذِيرَهُ
english: despite the excuses they come up with.

codes: ﯸ ﯹ ﯺ ﯻ ﯼ ﯽ ﯾ
text: لَا تُحَرِّكْ بِهِ لِسَانَكَ لِتَعْجَلَ بِهِ
english: Do not rush your tongue trying to memorize ˹a revelation of˺ the Quran.

codes: ﯿ ﰀ ﰁ ﰂ ﰃ
text: إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا جَمْعَهُ وَقُرْآنَهُ
english: It is certainly upon Us to ˹make you˺ memorize and recite it.

codes: ﰄ ﰅ ﰆ ﰇ ﰈ
text: فَإِذَا قَرَأْنَاهُ فَاتَّبِعْ قُرْآنَهُ
english: So once We have recited a revelation ˹through Gabriel˺, follow its recitation ˹closely˺.

codes: ﰉ ﰊ ﰋ ﰌ ﰍ
text: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا بَيَانَهُ
english: Then it is surely upon Us to make it clear ˹to you˺.

codes: ﭑ ﭒ ﭓ ﭔ ﭕ
text: كَلَّا بَلْ تُحِبُّونَ الْعَاجِلَةَ
english: But no! In fact, you love this fleeting world,

codes: ﭖ ﭗ ﭘ
text: وَتَذَرُونَ الْآخِرَةَ
english: and neglect the Hereafter.

codes: ﭙ ﭚ ﭛ ﭜ
text: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ نَّاضِرَةٌ
english: On that Day ˹some˺ faces will be bright,

codes: ﭝ ﭞ ﭟ ﭠ
text: إِلَىٰ رَبِّهَا نَاظِرَةٌ
english: looking at their Lord.

codes: ﭡ ﭢ ﭣ ﭤ
text: وَوُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ بَاسِرَةٌ
english: And ˹other˺ faces will be gloomy,

codes: ﭥ ﭦ ﭧ ﭨ ﭩ ﭪ
text: تَظُنُّ أَن يُفْعَلَ بِهَا فَاقِرَةٌ
english: anticipating something devastating to befall them.

codes: ﭫ ﭬ ﭭ ﭮ ﭯ
text: كَلَّا إِذَا بَلَغَتِ التَّرَاقِيَ
english: But no! ˹Beware of the day˺ when the soul reaches the collar bone ˹as it leaves˺,

codes: ﭰ ﭱ ﭲ ﭳ ﭴ
text: وَقِيلَ مَنْ ۜ رَاقٍ
english: and it will be said, “Is there any healer ˹who can save this life˺?”

codes: ﭵ ﭶ ﭷ ﭸ
text: وَظَنَّ أَنَّهُ الْفِرَاقُ
english: And the dying person realizes it is ˹their˺ time to depart,

codes: ﭹ ﭺ ﭻ ﭼ
text: وَالْتَفَّتِ السَّاقُ بِالسَّاقِ
english: and ˹then˺ their feet are tied together ˹in a shroud˺.

codes: ﭽ ﭾ ﭿ ﮀ ﮁ
text: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ الْمَسَاقُ
english: On that day they will be driven to your Lord ˹alone˺.

codes: ﮂ ﮃ ﮄ ﮅ ﮆ
text: فَلَا صَدَّقَ وَلَا صَلَّىٰ
english: This denier neither believed nor prayed,

codes: ﮇ ﮈ ﮉ ﮊ
text: وَلَٰكِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
english: but persisted in denial and turned away,

codes: ﮋ ﮌ ﮍ ﮎ ﮏ ﮐ
text: ثُمَّ ذَهَبَ إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِ يَتَمَطَّىٰ
english: then went to their own people, walking boastfully.

codes: ﮑ ﮒ ﮓ ﮔ
text: أَوْلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوْلَىٰ
english: Woe to you, and more woe!

codes: ﮕ ﮖ ﮗ ﮘ ﮙ
text: ثُمَّ أَوْلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوْلَىٰ
english: Again, woe to you, and even more woe!

codes: ﮚ ﮛ ﮜ ﮝ ﮞ ﮟ
text: أَيَحْسَبُ الْإِنسَانُ أَن يُتْرَكَ سُدًى
english: Do people think they will be left without purpose?

codes: ﮠ ﮡ ﮢ ﮣ ﮤ ﮥ ﮦ
text: أَلَمْ يَكُ نُطْفَةً مِّن مَّنِيٍّ يُمْنَىٰ
english: Were they not ˹once˺ a sperm-drop emitted?

codes: ﮧ ﮨ ﮩ ﮪ ﮫ ﮬ
text: ثُمَّ كَانَ عَلَقَةً فَخَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
english: Then they became a clinging clot ˹of blood˺, then He developed and perfected their form,

codes: ﮭ ﮮ ﮯ ﮰ ﮱ ﯓ
text: فَجَعَلَ مِنْهُ الزَّوْجَيْنِ الذَّكَرَ وَالْأُنثَىٰ
english: producing from it both sexes, male and female.

codes: ﯔ ﯕ ﯖ ﯗ ﯘ ﯙ ﯚ ﯛ
text: أَلَيْسَ ذَٰلِكَ بِقَادِرٍ عَلَىٰ أَن يُحْيِيَ الْمَوْتَىٰ
english: Is such ˹a Creator˺ unable to bring the dead back to life?

codes: ﯜ ﯝ ﯞ ﯟ ﯠ ﯡ ﯢ ﯣ ﯤ ﯥ ﯦ ﯧ
text: هَلْ أَتَىٰ عَلَى الْإِنسَانِ حِينٌ مِّنَ الدَّهْرِ لَمْ يَكُن شَيْئًا مَّذْكُورًا
english: Is there not a period of time when each human is nothing yet worth mentioning?

codes: ﯨ ﯩ ﯪ ﯫ ﯬ ﯭ ﯮ ﯯ ﯰ ﯱ ﯲ
text: إِنَّا خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ أَمْشَاجٍ نَّبْتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلْنَاهُ سَمِيعًا بَصِيرًا
english: ˹For˺ indeed, We ˹alone˺ created humans from a drop of mixed fluids, ˹in order˺ to test them, so We made them hear and see.

codes: ﯳ ﯴ ﯵ ﯶ ﯷ ﯸ ﯹ ﯺ
text: إِنَّا هَدَيْنَاهُ السَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرًا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا
english: We already showed them the Way, whether they ˹choose to˺ be grateful or ungrateful.

codes: ﯻ ﯼ ﯽ ﯾ ﯿ ﰀ ﰁ
text: إِنَّا أَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَافِرِينَ سَلَاسِلَ وَأَغْلَالًا وَسَعِيرًا
english: Indeed, We have prepared for the disbelievers chains, shackles, and a blazing Fire.

codes: ﰂ ﰃ ﰄ ﰅ ﰆ ﰇ ﰈ ﰉ ﰊ
text: إِنَّ الْأَبْرَارَ يَشْرَبُونَ مِن كَأْسٍ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا
english: Indeed, the virtuous will have a drink ˹of pure wine˺—flavoured with camphor—

codes: ﭑ ﭒ ﭓ ﭔ ﭕ ﭖ ﭗ ﭘ
text: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ اللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفْجِيرًا
english: ˹from˺ a spring where Allah’s servants will drink, flowing at their will.

codes: ﭙ ﭚ ﭛ ﭜ ﭝ ﭞ ﭟ ﭠ
text: يُوفُونَ بِالنَّذْرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوْمًا كَانَ شَرُّهُ مُسْتَطِيرًا
english: They ˹are those who˺ fulfil ˹their˺ vows and fear a Day of sweeping horror,

codes: ﭡ ﭢ ﭣ ﭤ ﭥ ﭦ ﭧ ﭨ
text: وَيُطْعِمُونَ الطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِ مِسْكِينًا وَيَتِيمًا وَأَسِيرًا
english: and give food—despite their desire for it—to the poor, the orphan, and the captive,

codes: ﭩ ﭪ ﭫ ﭬ ﭭ ﭮ ﭯ ﭰ ﭱ ﭲ ﭳ
text: إِنَّمَا نُطْعِمُكُمْ لِوَجْهِ اللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمْ جَزَاءً وَلَا شُكُورًا
english: ˹saying to themselves,˺ “We feed you only for the sake of Allah, seeking neither reward nor thanks from you.

codes: ﭴ ﭵ ﭶ ﭷ ﭸ ﭹ ﭺ ﭻ
text: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوْمًا عَبُوسًا قَمْطَرِيرًا
english: We fear from our Lord a horribly distressful Day.”

codes: ﭼ ﭽ ﭾ ﭿ ﮀ ﮁ ﮂ ﮃ ﮄ
text: فَوَقَاهُمُ اللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ الْيَوْمِ وَلَقَّاهُمْ نَضْرَةً وَسُرُورًا
english: So Allah will deliver them from the horror of that Day, and grant them radiance and joy,

codes: ﮅ ﮆ ﮇ ﮈ ﮉ ﮊ
text: وَجَزَاهُم بِمَا صَبَرُوا جَنَّةً وَحَرِيرًا
english: and reward them for their perseverance with a Garden ˹in Paradise˺ and ˹garments of˺ silk.

codes: ﮋ ﮌ ﮍ ﮎ ﮏ ﮐ ﮑ ﮒ ﮓ ﮔ ﮕ ﮖ
text: مُّتَّكِئِينَ فِيهَا عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ ۖ لَا يَرَوْنَ فِيهَا شَمْسًا وَلَا زَمْهَرِيرًا
english: There they will be reclining on ˹canopied˺ couches, never seeing scorching heat or bitter cold.

codes: ﮗ ﮘ ﮙ ﮚ ﮛ ﮜ ﮝ
text: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيْهِمْ ظِلَالُهَا وَذُلِّلَتْ قُطُوفُهَا تَذْلِيلًا
english: The Garden’s shade will be right above them, and its fruit will be made very easy to reach.

codes: ﮞ ﮟ ﮠ ﮡ ﮢ ﮣ ﮤ ﮥ ﮦ
text: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِآنِيَةٍ مِّن فِضَّةٍ وَأَكْوَابٍ كَانَتْ قَوَارِيرَا
english: They will be waited on with silver vessels and cups of crystal—

codes: ﮧ ﮨ ﮩ ﮪ ﮫ ﮬ
text: قَوَارِيرَ مِن فِضَّةٍ قَدَّرُوهَا تَقْدِيرًا
english: crystalline silver, filled precisely as desired.

codes: ﮭ ﮮ ﮯ ﮰ ﮱ ﯓ ﯔ
text: وَيُسْقَوْنَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِيلًا
english: And they will be given a drink ˹of pure wine˺ flavoured with ginger

codes: ﯕ ﯖ ﯗ ﯘ ﯙ
text: عَيْنًا فِيهَا تُسَمَّىٰ سَلْسَبِيلًا
english: from a spring there, called Salsabîl.

codes: ﯚ ﯛ ﯜ ﯝ ﯞ ﯟ ﯠ ﯡ ﯢ ﯣ ﯤ
text: وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ وِلْدَانٌ مُّخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَيْتَهُمْ حَسِبْتَهُمْ لُؤْلُؤًا مَّنثُورًا
english: They will be waited on by eternal youths. If you saw them, you would think they were scattered pearls.

codes: ﯥ ﯦ ﯧ ﯨ ﯩ ﯪ ﯫ ﯬ
text: وَإِذَا رَأَيْتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيْتَ نَعِيمًا وَمُلْكًا كَبِيرًا
english: And if you looked around, you would see ˹indescribable˺ bliss and a vast kingdom.

codes: ﯭ ﯮ ﯯ ﯰ ﯱ ﯲ ﯳ ﯴ ﯵ ﯶ ﯷ ﯸ ﯹ ﯺ ﯻ
text: عَالِيَهُمْ ثِيَابُ سُندُسٍ خُضْرٌ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٌ ۖ وَحُلُّوا أَسَاوِرَ مِن فِضَّةٍ وَسَقَاهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ شَرَابًا طَهُورًا
english: The virtuous will be ˹dressed˺ in garments of fine green silk and rich brocade, and adorned with bracelets of silver, and their Lord will give them a purifying drink.

codes: ﯼ ﯽ ﯾ ﯿ ﰀ ﰁ ﰂ ﰃ ﰄ
text: إِنَّ هَٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمْ جَزَاءً وَكَانَ سَعْيُكُم مَّشْكُورًا
english: ˹And they will be told,˺ “All this is surely a reward for you. Your striving has been appreciated.”

codes: ﰅ ﰆ ﰇ ﰈ ﰉ ﰊ ﰋ
text: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكَ الْقُرْآنَ تَنزِيلًا
english: Indeed, it is We Who have revealed the Quran to you ˹O Prophet˺ in stages.

codes: ﰌ ﰍ ﰎ ﰏ ﰐ ﰑ ﰒ ﰓ ﰔ ﰕ
text: فَاصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعْ مِنْهُمْ آثِمًا أَوْ كَفُورًا
english: So be patient with your Lord’s decree, and do not yield to any evildoer or ˹staunch˺ disbeliever from among them.

codes: ﰖ ﰗ ﰘ ﰙ ﰚ ﰛ
text: وَاذْكُرِ اسْمَ رَبِّكَ بُكْرَةً وَأَصِيلًا
english: ˹Always˺ remember the Name of your Lord morning and evening,

codes: ﭑ ﭒ ﭓ ﭔ ﭕ ﭖ ﭗ ﭘ
text: وَمِنَ اللَّيْلِ فَاسْجُدْ لَهُ وَسَبِّحْهُ لَيْلًا طَوِيلًا
english: and prostrate before Him during part of the night, and glorify Him long at night.

codes: ﭙ ﭚ ﭛ ﭜ ﭝ ﭞ ﭟ ﭠ ﭡ
text: إِنَّ هَٰؤُلَاءِ يُحِبُّونَ الْعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَاءَهُمْ يَوْمًا ثَقِيلًا
english: Surely those ˹pagans˺ love this fleeting world, ˹totally˺ neglecting a weighty Day ahead of them.

codes: ﭢ ﭣ ﭤ ﭥ ﭦ ﭧ ﭨ ﭩ ﭪ ﭫ ﭬ
text: نَّحْنُ خَلَقْنَاهُمْ وَشَدَدْنَا أَسْرَهُمْ ۖ وَإِذَا شِئْنَا بَدَّلْنَا أَمْثَالَهُمْ تَبْدِيلًا
english: It is We Who created them and perfected their ˹physical˺ form. But if We will, We can easily replace them with others.

codes: ﭭ ﭮ ﭯ ﭰ ﭱ ﭲ ﭳ ﭴ ﭵ ﭶ ﭷ
text: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِ تَذْكِرَةٌ ۖ فَمَن شَاءَ اتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِ سَبِيلًا
english: Surely this is a reminder. So let whoever wills take the ˹Right˺ Way to their Lord.

codes: ﭸ ﭹ ﭺ ﭻ ﭼ ﭽ ﭾ ﭿ ﮀ ﮁ ﮂ ﮃ ﮄ
text: وَمَا تَشَاءُونَ إِلَّا أَن يَشَاءَ اللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا
english: But you cannot will ˹to do so˺ unless Allah wills. Indeed, Allah is All-Knowing, All-Wise.

codes: ﮅ ﮆ ﮇ ﮈ ﮉ ﮊ ﮋ ﮌ ﮍ ﮎ ﮏ ﮐ
text: يُدْخِلُ مَن يَشَاءُ فِي رَحْمَتِهِ ۚ وَالظَّالِمِينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
english: He admits whoever He wills into His mercy. As for the wrongdoers, He has prepared for them a painful punishment

codes: ﮑ ﮒ ﮓ
text: وَالْمُرْسَلَاتِ عُرْفًا
english: By those ˹winds˺ sent forth successively,

codes: ﮔ ﮕ ﮖ
text: فَالْعَاصِفَاتِ عَصْفًا
english: and those blowing violently,

codes: ﮗ ﮘ ﮙ
text: وَالنَّاشِرَاتِ نَشْرًا
english: and those scattering ˹rainclouds˺ widely!

codes: ﮚ ﮛ ﮜ
text: فَالْفَارِقَاتِ فَرْقًا
english: And ˹by˺ those ˹angels˺ fully distinguishing ˹truth from falsehood˺,

codes: ﮝ ﮞ ﮟ
text: فَالْمُلْقِيَاتِ ذِكْرًا
english: and those delivering revelation,

codes: ﮠ ﮡ ﮢ ﮣ
text: عُذْرًا أَوْ نُذْرًا
english: ending excuses and giving warnings.

codes: ﮤ ﮥ ﮦ ﮧ
text: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَوَاقِعٌ
english: Surely, what you are promised will come to pass.

codes: ﮨ ﮩ ﮪ ﮫ
text: فَإِذَا النُّجُومُ طُمِسَتْ
english: So when the stars are put out,

codes: ﮬ ﮭ ﮮ ﮯ
text: وَإِذَا السَّمَاءُ فُرِجَتْ
english: and the sky is torn apart,

codes: ﮰ ﮱ ﯓ ﯔ
text: وَإِذَا الْجِبَالُ نُسِفَتْ
english: and the mountains are blown away,

codes: ﯕ ﯖ ﯗ ﯘ
text: وَإِذَا الرُّسُلُ أُقِّتَتْ
english: and the messengers’ time ˹to testify˺ comes up—

codes: ﯙ ﯚ ﯛ ﯜ
text: لِأَيِّ يَوْمٍ أُجِّلَتْ
english: for which Day has all this been set?

codes: ﯝ ﯞ ﯟ
text: لِيَوْمِ الْفَصْلِ
english: For the Day of ˹Final˺ Decision!

codes: ﯠ ﯡ ﯢ ﯣ ﯤ ﯥ
text: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا يَوْمُ الْفَصْلِ
english: And what will make you realize what the Day of Decision is?

codes: ﯦ ﯧ ﯨ ﯩ
text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
english: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

codes: ﯪ ﯫ ﯬ ﯭ
text: أَلَمْ نُهْلِكِ الْأَوَّلِينَ
english: Did We not destroy earlier disbelievers?

codes: ﯮ ﯯ ﯰ ﯱ
text: ثُمَّ نُتْبِعُهُمُ الْآخِرِينَ
english: And We will make the later disbelievers follow them.

codes: ﯲ ﯳ ﯴ ﯵ
text: كَذَٰلِكَ نَفْعَلُ بِالْمُجْرِمِينَ
english: This is how We deal with the wicked.

codes: ﯶ ﯷ ﯸ ﯹ
text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
english: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

codes: ﭑ ﭒ ﭓ ﭔ ﭕ ﭖ
text: أَلَمْ نَخْلُقكُّم مِّن مَّاءٍ مَّهِينٍ
english: Did We not create you from a humble fluid,

codes: ﭗ ﭘ ﭙ ﭚ ﭛ
text: فَجَعَلْنَاهُ فِي قَرَارٍ مَّكِينٍ
english: placing it in a secure place

codes: ﭜ ﭝ ﭞ ﭟ
text: إِلَىٰ قَدَرٍ مَّعْلُومٍ
english: until an appointed time?

codes: ﭠ ﭡ ﭢ ﭣ
text: فَقَدَرْنَا فَنِعْمَ الْقَادِرُونَ
english: We ˹perfectly˺ ordained ˹its development˺. How excellent are We in doing so!

codes: ﭤ ﭥ ﭦ ﭧ
text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
english: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

codes: ﭨ ﭩ ﭪ ﭫ ﭬ
text: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ الْأَرْضَ كِفَاتًا
english: Have We not made the earth a lodging

codes: ﭭ ﭮ ﭯ
text: أَحْيَاءً وَأَمْوَاتًا
english: for the living and the dead,

codes: ﭰ ﭱ ﭲ ﭳ ﭴ ﭵ ﭶ ﭷ
text: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا رَوَاسِيَ شَامِخَاتٍ وَأَسْقَيْنَاكُم مَّاءً فُرَاتًا
english: and placed upon it towering, firm mountains, and given you fresh water to drink?

codes: ﭸ ﭹ ﭺ ﭻ
text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
english: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

codes: ﭼ ﭽ ﭾ ﭿ ﮀ ﮁ ﮂ
text: انطَلِقُوا إِلَىٰ مَا كُنتُم بِهِ تُكَذِّبُونَ
english: ˹The disbelievers will be told,˺ “Proceed into that ˹Fire˺ which you used to deny!

codes: ﮃ ﮄ ﮅ ﮆ ﮇ ﮈ ﮉ
text: انطَلِقُوا إِلَىٰ ظِلٍّ ذِي ثَلَاثِ شُعَبٍ
english: Proceed into the shade ˹of smoke˺ which rises in three columns,

codes: ﮊ ﮋ ﮌ ﮍ ﮎ ﮏ ﮐ
text: لَّا ظَلِيلٍ وَلَا يُغْنِي مِنَ اللَّهَبِ
english: providing neither coolness nor shelter from the flames.

codes: ﮑ ﮒ ﮓ ﮔ ﮕ
text: إِنَّهَا تَرْمِي بِشَرَرٍ كَالْقَصْرِ
english: Indeed, it hurls sparks ˹as big˺ as huge castles,

codes: ﮖ ﮗ ﮘ ﮙ
text: كَأَنَّهُ جِمَالَتٌ صُفْرٌ
english: and ˹as dark˺ as black camels.”

codes: ﮚ ﮛ ﮜ ﮝ
text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
english: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

codes: ﮞ ﮟ ﮠ ﮡ ﮢ
text: هَٰذَا يَوْمُ لَا يَنطِقُونَ
english: On that Day they will not ˹be in a position to˺ speak,

codes: ﮣ ﮤ ﮥ ﮦ ﮧ
text: وَلَا يُؤْذَنُ لَهُمْ فَيَعْتَذِرُونَ
english: nor will they be permitted to offer excuses.

codes: ﮨ ﮩ ﮪ ﮫ
text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
english: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

codes: ﮬ ﮭ ﮮ ﮯ ﮰ ﮱ ﯓ
text: هَٰذَا يَوْمُ الْفَصْلِ ۖ جَمَعْنَاكُمْ وَالْأَوَّلِينَ
english: ˹They will be told by Allah,˺ “This is the Day of ˹Final˺ Decision: We have gathered you along with earlier disbelievers ˹for punishment˺.

codes: ﯔ ﯕ ﯖ ﯗ ﯘ ﯙ
text: فَإِن كَانَ لَكُمْ كَيْدٌ فَكِيدُونِ
english: So if you have a scheme ˹to save yourselves˺, then use it against Me.”

codes: ﯚ ﯛ ﯜ ﯝ
text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
english: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

codes: ﯞ ﯟ ﯠ ﯡ ﯢ ﯣ
text: إِنَّ الْمُتَّقِينَ فِي ظِلَالٍ وَعُيُونٍ
english: Indeed, the righteous will be amid ˹cool˺ shade and springs

codes: ﯤ ﯥ ﯦ ﯧ
text: وَفَوَاكِهَ مِمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
english: and any fruit they desire.

codes: ﯨ ﯩ ﯪ ﯫ ﯬ ﯭ ﯮ
text: كُلُوا وَاشْرَبُوا هَنِيئًا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
english: ˹They will be told,˺ “Eat and drink happily for what you used to do.”

codes: ﯯ ﯰ ﯱ ﯲ ﯳ
text: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
english: Surely this is how We reward the good-doers.

codes: ﯴ ﯵ ﯶ ﯷ
text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
english: ˹But˺ woe on that Day to the deniers!

codes: ﯸ ﯹ ﯺ ﯻ ﯼ ﯽ
text: كُلُوا وَتَمَتَّعُوا قَلِيلًا إِنَّكُم مُّجْرِمُونَ
english: “Eat and enjoy yourselves for a little while, ˹for˺ you are truly wicked.”

codes: ﯾ ﯿ ﰀ ﰁ
text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
english: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

codes: ﰂ ﰃ ﰄ ﰅ ﰆ ﰇ ﰈ
text: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ارْكَعُوا لَا يَرْكَعُونَ
english: When it is said to them, “Bow down ˹before Allah,” they do not bow.

codes: ﰉ ﰊ ﰋ ﰌ
text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
english: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

codes: ﰍ ﰎ ﰏ ﰐ ﰑ
text: فَبِأَيِّ حَدِيثٍ بَعْدَهُ يُؤْمِنُونَ
english: So what message after this ˹Quran˺ would they believe in?

codes: ﭑ ﭒ ﭓ
text: عَمَّ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ
english: What are they asking one another about?

codes: ﭔ ﭕ ﭖ ﭗ
text: عَنِ النَّبَإِ الْعَظِيمِ
english: About the momentous news,

codes: ﭘ ﭙ ﭚ ﭛ ﭜ
text: الَّذِي هُمْ فِيهِ مُخْتَلِفُونَ
english: over which they disagree.

codes: ﭝ ﭞ ﭟ
text: كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ
english: But no! They will come to know.

codes: ﭠ ﭡ ﭢ ﭣ
text: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ
english: Again, no! They will come to know.

codes: ﭤ ﭥ ﭦ ﭧ ﭨ
text: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ الْأَرْضَ مِهَادًا
english: Have We not smoothed out the earth ˹like a bed˺,

codes: ﭩ ﭪ ﭫ
text: وَالْجِبَالَ أَوْتَادًا
english: and ˹made˺ the mountains as ˹its˺ pegs,

codes: ﭬ ﭭ ﭮ
text: وَخَلَقْنَاكُمْ أَزْوَاجًا
english: and created you in pairs,

codes: ﭯ ﭰ ﭱ ﭲ
text: وَجَعَلْنَا نَوْمَكُمْ سُبَاتًا
english: and made your sleep for rest,

codes: ﭳ ﭴ ﭵ ﭶ
text: وَجَعَلْنَا اللَّيْلَ لِبَاسًا
english: and made the night as a cover,

codes: ﭷ ﭸ ﭹ ﭺ
text: وَجَعَلْنَا النَّهَارَ مَعَاشًا
english: and made the day for livelihood,

codes: ﭻ ﭼ ﭽ ﭾ ﭿ
text: وَبَنَيْنَا فَوْقَكُمْ سَبْعًا شِدَادًا
english: and built above you seven mighty ˹heavens˺,

codes: ﮀ ﮁ ﮂ ﮃ
text: وَجَعَلْنَا سِرَاجًا وَهَّاجًا
english: and placed ˹in them˺ a shining lamp,

codes: ﮄ ﮅ ﮆ ﮇ ﮈ ﮉ
text: وَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ الْمُعْصِرَاتِ مَاءً ثَجَّاجًا
english: and sent down from rainclouds pouring water,

codes: ﮊ ﮋ ﮌ ﮍ ﮎ
text: لِّنُخْرِجَ بِهِ حَبًّا وَنَبَاتًا
english: producing by it grain and ˹various˺ plants,

codes: ﮏ ﮐ ﮑ
text: وَجَنَّاتٍ أَلْفَافًا
english: and dense orchards?

codes: ﮒ ﮓ ﮔ ﮕ ﮖ ﮗ
text: إِنَّ يَوْمَ الْفَصْلِ كَانَ مِيقَاتًا
english: Indeed, the Day of ˹Final˺ Decision is an appointed time—

codes: ﮘ ﮙ ﮚ ﮛ ﮜ ﮝ ﮞ
text: يَوْمَ يُنفَخُ فِي الصُّورِ فَتَأْتُونَ أَفْوَاجًا
english: ˹it is˺ the Day the Trumpet will be blown, and you will ˹all˺ come forth in crowds.

codes: ﮟ ﮠ ﮡ ﮢ ﮣ
text: وَفُتِحَتِ السَّمَاءُ فَكَانَتْ أَبْوَابًا
english: The sky will be ˹split˺ open, becoming ˹many˺ gates,

codes: ﮤ ﮥ ﮦ ﮧ ﮨ
text: وَسُيِّرَتِ الْجِبَالُ فَكَانَتْ سَرَابًا
english: and the mountains will be blown away, becoming ˹like˺ a mirage.

codes: ﮩ ﮪ ﮫ ﮬ ﮭ
text: إِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ كَانَتْ مِرْصَادًا
english: Indeed, Hell is lying in ambush

codes: ﮮ ﮯ ﮰ
text: لِّلطَّاغِينَ مَآبًا
english: as a home for the transgressors,

codes: ﮱ ﯓ ﯔ ﯕ
text: لَّابِثِينَ فِيهَا أَحْقَابًا
english: where they will remain for ˹endless˺ ages.

codes: ﯖ ﯗ ﯘ ﯙ ﯚ ﯛ ﯜ
text: لَّا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرْدًا وَلَا شَرَابًا
english: There they will not taste any coolness or drink,

codes: ﯝ ﯞ ﯟ ﯠ
text: إِلَّا حَمِيمًا وَغَسَّاقًا
english: except boiling water and ˹oozing˺ pus—

codes: ﯡ ﯢ ﯣ
text: جَزَاءً وِفَاقًا
english: a fitting reward.

codes: ﯤ ﯥ ﯦ ﯧ ﯨ ﯩ
text: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا لَا يَرْجُونَ حِسَابًا
english: For they never expected any reckoning,

codes: ﯪ ﯫ ﯬ ﯭ
text: وَكَذَّبُوا بِآيَاتِنَا كِذَّابًا
english: and totally rejected Our signs.

codes: ﯮ ﯯ ﯰ ﯱ ﯲ
text: وَكُلَّ شَيْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَاهُ كِتَابًا
english: And We have everything recorded precisely.

codes: ﯳ ﯴ ﯵ ﯶ ﯷ ﯸ
text: فَذُوقُوا فَلَن نَّزِيدَكُمْ إِلَّا عَذَابًا
english: ˹So the deniers will be told,˺ “Taste ˹the punishment˺, for all you will get from Us is more torment.”

codes: ﭑ ﭒ ﭓ ﭔ
text: إِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ مَفَازًا
english: Indeed, the righteous will have salvation—

codes: ﭕ ﭖ ﭗ
text: حَدَائِقَ وَأَعْنَابًا
english: Gardens, vineyards,

codes: ﭘ ﭙ ﭚ
text: وَكَوَاعِبَ أَتْرَابًا
english: and full-bosomed maidens of equal age,

codes: ﭛ ﭜ ﭝ
text: وَكَأْسًا دِهَاقًا
english: and full cups ˹of pure wine˺,

codes: ﭞ ﭟ ﭠ ﭡ ﭢ ﭣ ﭤ
text: لَّا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًا وَلَا كِذَّابًا
english: never to hear any idle talk or lying therein—

codes: ﭥ ﭦ ﭧ ﭨ ﭩ ﭪ
text: جَزَاءً مِّن رَّبِّكَ عَطَاءً حِسَابًا
english: a ˹fitting˺ reward as a generous gift from your Lord,

codes: ﭫ ﭬ ﭭ ﭮ ﭯ ﭰ ﭱ ﭲ ﭳ ﭴ ﭵ ﭶ
text: رَّبِّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا الرَّحْمَٰنِ ۖ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ مِنْهُ خِطَابًا
english: the Lord of the heavens and the earth and everything in between, the Most Compassionate. No one will dare speak to Him

codes: ﭷ ﭸ ﭹ ﭺ ﭻ ﭼ ﭽ ﭾ ﭿ ﮀ ﮁ ﮂ ﮃ ﮄ ﮅ ﮆ
text: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ الرُّوحُ وَالْمَلَائِكَةُ صَفًّا ۖ لَّا يَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنْ أَذِنَ لَهُ الرَّحْمَٰنُ وَقَالَ صَوَابًا
english: on the Day the ˹holy˺ spirit and the angels will stand in ranks. None will talk, except those granted permission by the Most Compassionate and whose words are true.

codes: ﮇ ﮈ ﮉ ﮊ ﮋ ﮌ ﮍ ﮎ ﮏ ﮐ ﮑ
text: ذَٰلِكَ الْيَوْمُ الْحَقُّ ۖ فَمَن شَاءَ اتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِ مَآبًا
english: That Day is the ˹ultimate˺ truth. So let whoever wills take the path leading back to their Lord.

codes: ﮒ ﮓ ﮔ ﮕ ﮖ ﮗ ﮘ ﮙ ﮚ ﮛ ﮜ ﮝ ﮞ ﮟ ﮠ ﮡ
text: إِنَّا أَنذَرْنَاكُمْ عَذَابًا قَرِيبًا يَوْمَ يَنظُرُ الْمَرْءُ مَا قَدَّمَتْ يَدَاهُ وَيَقُولُ الْكَافِرُ يَا لَيْتَنِي كُنتُ تُرَابًا
english: Indeed, We have warned you of an imminent punishment—the Day every person will see ˹the consequences of˺ what their hands have done, and the disbelievers will cry, “I wish I were dust.”

codes: ﮢ ﮣ ﮤ
text: وَالنَّازِعَاتِ غَرْقًا
english: By those ˹angels˺ stripping out ˹evil souls˺ harshly,

codes: ﮥ ﮦ ﮧ
text: وَالنَّاشِطَاتِ نَشْطًا
english: and those pulling out ˹good souls˺ gently,

codes: ﮨ ﮩ ﮪ
text: وَالسَّابِحَاتِ سَبْحًا
english: and those gliding ˹through heavens˺ swiftly,

codes: ﮫ ﮬ ﮭ
text: فَالسَّابِقَاتِ سَبْقًا
english: and those taking the lead vigorously,

codes: ﮮ ﮯ ﮰ
text: فَالْمُدَبِّرَاتِ أَمْرًا
english: and those conducting affairs ˹obediently˺!

codes: ﮱ ﯓ ﯔ ﯕ
text: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ الرَّاجِفَةُ
english: ˹Consider˺ the Day ˹when˺ the quaking Blast will come to pass,

codes: ﯖ ﯗ ﯘ
text: تَتْبَعُهَا الرَّادِفَةُ
english: followed by a second Blast.

codes: ﯙ ﯚ ﯛ ﯜ
text: قُلُوبٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ وَاجِفَةٌ
english: ˹The deniers’˺ hearts on that Day will be trembling ˹in horror˺,

codes: ﯝ ﯞ ﯟ
text: أَبْصَارُهَا خَاشِعَةٌ
english: with their eyes downcast.

codes: ﯠ ﯡ ﯢ ﯣ ﯤ ﯥ
text: يَقُولُونَ أَإِنَّا لَمَرْدُودُونَ فِي الْحَافِرَةِ
english: ˹But now˺ they ask ˹mockingly˺, “Will we really be restored to our former state,

codes: ﯦ ﯧ ﯨ ﯩ ﯪ
text: أَإِذَا كُنَّا عِظَامًا نَّخِرَةً
english: even after we have been reduced to decayed bones?”

codes: ﯫ ﯬ ﯭ ﯮ ﯯ ﯰ
text: قَالُوا تِلْكَ إِذًا كَرَّةٌ خَاسِرَةٌ
english: Adding, “Then such a return would be a ˹total˺ loss ˹for us˺!”

codes: ﯱ ﯲ ﯳ ﯴ ﯵ
text: فَإِنَّمَا هِيَ زَجْرَةٌ وَاحِدَةٌ
english: But indeed, it will take only one ˹mighty˺ Blast,

codes: ﯶ ﯷ ﯸ ﯹ
text: فَإِذَا هُم بِالسَّاهِرَةِ
english: and at once they will be above ground.

codes: ﯺ ﯻ ﯼ ﯽ ﯾ
text: هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ مُوسَىٰ
english: Has the story of Moses reached you ˹O Prophet˺?

codes: ﭑ ﭒ ﭓ ﭔ ﭕ ﭖ ﭗ
text: إِذْ نَادَاهُ رَبُّهُ بِالْوَادِ الْمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى
english: His Lord called him in the sacred valley of Ṭuwa,

codes: ﭘ ﭙ ﭚ ﭛ ﭜ ﭝ
text: اذْهَبْ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّهُ طَغَىٰ
english: ˹commanding,˺ “Go to Pharaoh, for he has truly transgressed ˹all bounds˺.

codes: ﭞ ﭟ ﭠ ﭡ ﭢ ﭣ ﭤ
text: فَقُلْ هَل لَّكَ إِلَىٰ أَن تَزَكَّىٰ
english: And say, ‘Would you ˹be willing to˺ purify yourself,

codes: ﭥ ﭦ ﭧ ﭨ ﭩ
text: وَأَهْدِيَكَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَتَخْشَىٰ
english: and let me guide you to your Lord so that you will be in awe ˹of Him˺?’”

codes: ﭪ ﭫ ﭬ ﭭ
text: فَأَرَاهُ الْآيَةَ الْكُبْرَىٰ
english: Then Moses showed him the great sign,

codes: ﭮ ﭯ ﭰ
text: فَكَذَّبَ وَعَصَىٰ
english: but he denied and disobeyed ˹Allah˺,

codes: ﭱ ﭲ ﭳ ﭴ
text: ثُمَّ أَدْبَرَ يَسْعَىٰ
english: then turned his back, striving ˹against the truth˺.

codes: ﭵ ﭶ ﭷ
text: فَحَشَرَ فَنَادَىٰ
english: Then he summoned ˹his people˺ and called out,

codes: ﭸ ﭹ ﭺ ﭻ ﭼ
text: فَقَالَ أَنَا رَبُّكُمُ الْأَعْلَىٰ
english: saying, “I am your lord, the most high!”

codes: ﭽ ﭾ ﭿ ﮀ ﮁ ﮂ
text: فَأَخَذَهُ اللَّهُ نَكَالَ الْآخِرَةِ وَالْأُولَىٰ
english: So Allah overtook him, making him an example in this life and the next.

codes: ﮃ ﮄ ﮅ ﮆ ﮇ ﮈ ﮉ
text: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبْرَةً لِّمَن يَخْشَىٰ
english: Surely in this is a lesson for whoever stands in awe of ˹Allah˺.

codes: ﮊ ﮋ ﮌ ﮍ ﮎ ﮏ ﮐ ﮑ
text: أَأَنتُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَمِ السَّمَاءُ ۚ بَنَاهَا
english: Which is harder to create: you or the sky? He built it,

codes: ﮒ ﮓ ﮔ ﮕ
text: رَفَعَ سَمْكَهَا فَسَوَّاهَا
english: raising it high and forming it flawlessly.

codes: ﮖ ﮗ ﮘ ﮙ ﮚ
text: وَأَغْطَشَ لَيْلَهَا وَأَخْرَجَ ضُحَاهَا
english: He dimmed its night, and brought forth its daylight.

codes: ﮛ ﮜ ﮝ ﮞ ﮟ
text: وَالْأَرْضَ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ دَحَاهَا
english: As for the earth, He spread it out as well,

codes: ﮠ ﮡ ﮢ ﮣ ﮤ
text: أَخْرَجَ مِنْهَا مَاءَهَا وَمَرْعَاهَا
english: bringing forth its water and pastures

codes: ﮥ ﮦ ﮧ
text: وَالْجِبَالَ أَرْسَاهَا
english: and setting the mountains firmly ˹upon it˺—

codes: ﮨ ﮩ ﮪ ﮫ
text: مَتَاعًا لَّكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَامِكُمْ
english: all as ˹a means of˺ sustenance for you and your animals.

codes: ﮬ ﮭ ﮮ ﮯ ﮰ
text: فَإِذَا جَاءَتِ الطَّامَّةُ الْكُبْرَىٰ
english: But, when the Supreme Disaster comes to pass—

codes: ﮱ ﯓ ﯔ ﯕ ﯖ ﯗ
text: يَوْمَ يَتَذَكَّرُ الْإِنسَانُ مَا سَعَىٰ
english: the Day every person will remember all ˹their˺ striving,

codes: ﯘ ﯙ ﯚ ﯛ ﯜ
text: وَبُرِّزَتِ الْجَحِيمُ لِمَن يَرَىٰ
english: and the Hellfire will be displayed for all to see—

codes: ﯝ ﯞ ﯟ ﯠ
text: فَأَمَّا مَن طَغَىٰ
english: then as for those who transgressed

codes: ﯡ ﯢ ﯣ ﯤ
text: وَآثَرَ الْحَيَاةَ الدُّنْيَا
english: and preferred the ˹fleeting˺ life of this world,

codes: ﯥ ﯦ ﯧ ﯨ ﯩ
text: فَإِنَّ الْجَحِيمَ هِيَ الْمَأْوَىٰ
english: the Hellfire will certainly be ˹their˺ home.

codes: ﯪ ﯫ ﯬ ﯭ ﯮ ﯯ ﯰ ﯱ ﯲ ﯳ
text: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِ وَنَهَى النَّفْسَ عَنِ الْهَوَىٰ
english: And as for those who were in awe of standing before their Lord and restrained themselves from ˹evil˺ desires,

codes: ﯴ ﯵ ﯶ ﯷ ﯸ
text: فَإِنَّ الْجَنَّةَ هِيَ الْمَأْوَىٰ
english: Paradise will certainly be ˹their˺ home.

codes: ﯹ ﯺ ﯻ ﯼ ﯽ ﯾ
text: يَسْأَلُونَكَ عَنِ السَّاعَةِ أَيَّانَ مُرْسَاهَا
english: They ask you ˹O Prophet˺ regarding the Hour, “When will it be?”

codes: ﯿ ﰀ ﰁ ﰂ ﰃ
text: فِيمَ أَنتَ مِن ذِكْرَاهَا
english: But it is not for you to tell its time.

codes: ﰄ ﰅ ﰆ ﰇ
text: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ مُنتَهَاهَا
english: That knowledge rests with your Lord ˹alone˺.

codes: ﰈ ﰉ ﰊ ﰋ ﰌ ﰍ
text: إِنَّمَا أَنتَ مُنذِرُ مَن يَخْشَاهَا
english: Your duty is only to warn whoever is in awe of it.

codes: ﰎ ﰏ ﰐ ﰑ ﰒ ﰓ ﰔ ﰕ ﰖ ﰗ
text: كَأَنَّهُمْ يَوْمَ يَرَوْنَهَا لَمْ يَلْبَثُوا إِلَّا عَشِيَّةً أَوْ ضُحَاهَا
english: On the Day they see it, it will be as if they had stayed ˹in the world˺ no more than one evening or its morning.

codes: ﭑ ﭒ ﭓ
text: عَبَسَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
english: He frowned and turned ˹his attention˺ away,

codes: ﭔ ﭕ ﭖ ﭗ
text: أَن جَاءَهُ الْأَعْمَىٰ
english: ˹simply˺ because the blind man came to him ˹interrupting˺.

codes: ﭘ ﭙ ﭚ ﭛ ﭜ
text: وَمَا يُدْرِيكَ لَعَلَّهُ يَزَّكَّىٰ
english: You never know ˹O Prophet˺, perhaps he may be purified,

codes: ﭝ ﭞ ﭟ ﭠ ﭡ
text: أَوْ يَذَّكَّرُ فَتَنفَعَهُ الذِّكْرَىٰ
english: or he may be mindful, benefitting from the reminder.

codes: ﭢ ﭣ ﭤ ﭥ
text: أَمَّا مَنِ اسْتَغْنَىٰ
english: As for the one who was indifferent,

codes: ﭦ ﭧ ﭨ ﭩ
text: فَأَنتَ لَهُ تَصَدَّىٰ
english: you gave him your ˹undivided˺ attention,

codes: ﭪ ﭫ ﭬ ﭭ ﭮ
text: وَمَا عَلَيْكَ أَلَّا يَزَّكَّىٰ
english: even though you are not to blame if he would not be purified.

codes: ﭯ ﭰ ﭱ ﭲ ﭳ
text: وَأَمَّا مَن جَاءَكَ يَسْعَىٰ
english: But as for the one who came to you, eager ˹to learn˺,

codes: ﭴ ﭵ ﭶ
text: وَهُوَ يَخْشَىٰ
english: being in awe ˹of Allah˺,

codes: ﭷ ﭸ ﭹ ﭺ
text: فَأَنتَ عَنْهُ تَلَهَّىٰ
english: you were inattentive to him.

codes: ﭻ ﭼ ﭽ ﭾ
text: كَلَّا إِنَّهَا تَذْكِرَةٌ
english: But no! This ˹revelation˺ is truly a reminder.

codes: ﭿ ﮀ ﮁ ﮂ
text: فَمَن شَاءَ ذَكَرَهُ
english: So let whoever wills be mindful of it.

codes: ﮃ ﮄ ﮅ ﮆ
text: فِي صُحُفٍ مُّكَرَّمَةٍ
english: It is ˹written˺ on pages held in honour—

codes: ﮇ ﮈ ﮉ
text: مَّرْفُوعَةٍ مُّطَهَّرَةٍ
english: highly esteemed, purified—

codes: ﮊ ﮋ ﮌ
text: بِأَيْدِي سَفَرَةٍ
english: by the hands of angel-scribes,

codes: ﮍ ﮎ ﮏ
text: كِرَامٍ بَرَرَةٍ
english: honourable and virtuous.

codes: ﮐ ﮑ ﮒ ﮓ ﮔ
text: قُتِلَ الْإِنسَانُ مَا أَكْفَرَهُ
english: Condemned are ˹disbelieving˺ humans! How ungrateful they are ˹to Allah˺!

codes: ﮕ ﮖ ﮗ ﮘ ﮙ
text: مِنْ أَيِّ شَيْءٍ خَلَقَهُ
english: From what substance did He create them?

codes: ﮚ ﮛ ﮜ ﮝ ﮞ
text: مِن نُّطْفَةٍ خَلَقَهُ فَقَدَّرَهُ
english: He created them from a sperm-drop, and ordained their development.

codes: ﮟ ﮠ ﮡ ﮢ
text: ثُمَّ السَّبِيلَ يَسَّرَهُ
english: Then He makes the way easy for them,

codes: ﮣ ﮤ ﮥ ﮦ
text: ثُمَّ أَمَاتَهُ فَأَقْبَرَهُ
english: then causes them to die and be buried.

codes: ﮧ ﮨ ﮩ ﮪ ﮫ
text: ثُمَّ إِذَا شَاءَ أَنشَرَهُ
english: Then when He wills, He will resurrect them.

codes: ﮬ ﮭ ﮮ ﮯ ﮰ ﮱ
text: كَلَّا لَمَّا يَقْضِ مَا أَمَرَهُ
english: But no! They have failed to comply with what He ordered.

codes: ﯓ ﯔ ﯕ ﯖ ﯗ
text: فَلْيَنظُرِ الْإِنسَانُ إِلَىٰ طَعَامِهِ
english: Let people then consider their food:

codes: ﯘ ﯙ ﯚ ﯛ ﯜ
text: أَنَّا صَبَبْنَا الْمَاءَ صَبًّا
english: how We pour down rain in abundance

codes: ﯝ ﯞ ﯟ ﯠ ﯡ
text: ثُمَّ شَقَقْنَا الْأَرْضَ شَقًّا
english: and meticulously split the earth open ˹for sprouts˺,

codes: ﯢ ﯣ ﯤ ﯥ
text: فَأَنبَتْنَا فِيهَا حَبًّا
english: causing grain to grow in it,

codes: ﯦ ﯧ ﯨ
text: وَعِنَبًا وَقَضْبًا
english: as well as grapes and greens,

codes: ﯩ ﯪ ﯫ
text: وَزَيْتُونًا وَنَخْلًا
english: and olives and palm trees,

codes: ﯬ ﯭ ﯮ
text: وَحَدَائِقَ غُلْبًا
english: and dense orchards,

codes: ﯯ ﯰ ﯱ
text: وَفَاكِهَةً وَأَبًّا
english: and fruit and fodder—

codes: ﯲ ﯳ ﯴ ﯵ
text: مَّتَاعًا لَّكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَامِكُمْ
english: all as ˹a means of˺ sustenance for you and your animals.

codes: ﯶ ﯷ ﯸ ﯹ
text: فَإِذَا جَاءَتِ الصَّاخَّةُ
english: Then, when the Deafening Blast comes to pass—

codes: ﯺ ﯻ ﯼ ﯽ ﯾ ﯿ
text: يَوْمَ يَفِرُّ الْمَرْءُ مِنْ أَخِيهِ
english: on that Day every person will flee from their own siblings,

codes: ﰀ ﰁ ﰂ
text: وَأُمِّهِ وَأَبِيهِ
english: and ˹even˺ their mother and father,

codes: ﰃ ﰄ ﰅ
text: وَصَاحِبَتِهِ وَبَنِيهِ
english: and ˹even˺ their spouse and children.

codes: ﰆ ﰇ ﰈ ﰉ ﰊ ﰋ ﰌ
text: لِكُلِّ امْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ شَأْنٌ يُغْنِيهِ
english: For then everyone will have enough concern of their own.

codes: ﰍ ﰎ ﰏ ﰐ
text: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ مُّسْفِرَةٌ
english: On that Day ˹some˺ faces will be bright,

codes: ﰑ ﰒ ﰓ
text: ضَاحِكَةٌ مُّسْتَبْشِرَةٌ
english: laughing and rejoicing,

codes: ﰔ ﰕ ﰖ ﰗ ﰘ
text: وَوُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَلَيْهَا غَبَرَةٌ
english: while ˹other˺ faces will be dusty,

codes: ﰙ ﰚ ﰛ
text: تَرْهَقُهَا قَتَرَةٌ
english: cast in gloom—

codes: ﰜ ﰝ ﰞ ﰟ ﰠ
text: أُولَٰئِكَ هُمُ الْكَفَرَةُ الْفَجَرَةُ
english: those are the disbelievers, the ˹wicked˺ sinners.

codes: ﭑ ﭒ ﭓ ﭔ
text: إِذَا الشَّمْسُ كُوِّرَتْ
english: When the sun is put out,

codes: ﭕ ﭖ ﭗ ﭘ
text: وَإِذَا النُّجُومُ انكَدَرَتْ
english: and when the stars fall down,

codes: ﭙ ﭚ ﭛ ﭜ
text: وَإِذَا الْجِبَالُ سُيِّرَتْ
english: and when the mountains are blown away,

codes: ﭝ ﭞ ﭟ ﭠ
text: وَإِذَا الْعِشَارُ عُطِّلَتْ
english: and when pregnant camels are left untended,

codes: ﭡ ﭢ ﭣ ﭤ
text: وَإِذَا الْوُحُوشُ حُشِرَتْ
english: and when wild beasts are gathered together,

codes: ﭥ ﭦ ﭧ ﭨ
text: وَإِذَا الْبِحَارُ سُجِّرَتْ
english: and when the seas are set on fire,

codes: ﭩ ﭪ ﭫ ﭬ
text: وَإِذَا النُّفُوسُ زُوِّجَتْ
english: and when the souls ˹and their bodies˺ are paired ˹once more˺,

codes: ﭭ ﭮ ﭯ ﭰ
text: وَإِذَا الْمَوْءُودَةُ سُئِلَتْ
english: and when baby girls, buried alive, are asked

codes: ﭱ ﭲ ﭳ ﭴ
text: بِأَيِّ ذَنبٍ قُتِلَتْ
english: for what crime they were put to death,

codes: ﭵ ﭶ ﭷ ﭸ
text: وَإِذَا الصُّحُفُ نُشِرَتْ
english: and when the records ˹of deeds˺ are laid open,

codes: ﭹ ﭺ ﭻ ﭼ
text: وَإِذَا السَّمَاءُ كُشِطَتْ
english: and when the sky is stripped away,

codes: ﭽ ﭾ ﭿ ﮀ
text: وَإِذَا الْجَحِيمُ سُعِّرَتْ
english: and when the Hellfire is fiercely flared up,

codes: ﮁ ﮂ ﮃ ﮄ
text: وَإِذَا الْجَنَّةُ أُزْلِفَتْ
english: and when Paradise is brought near—

codes: ﮅ ﮆ ﮇ ﮈ ﮉ
text: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌ مَّا أَحْضَرَتْ
english: ˹on that Day˺ each soul will know what ˹deeds˺ it has brought along.

codes: ﮊ ﮋ ﮌ ﮍ
text: فَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِالْخُنَّسِ
english: I do swear by the receding stars

codes: ﮎ ﮏ ﮐ
text: الْجَوَارِ الْكُنَّسِ
english: which travel and hide,

codes: ﮑ ﮒ ﮓ ﮔ
text: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا عَسْعَسَ
english: and the night as it falls

codes: ﮕ ﮖ ﮗ ﮘ
text: وَالصُّبْحِ إِذَا تَنَفَّسَ
english: and the day as it breaks!

codes: ﮙ ﮚ ﮛ ﮜ ﮝ
text: إِنَّهُ لَقَوْلُ رَسُولٍ كَرِيمٍ
english: Indeed, this ˹Quran˺ is the Word of ˹Allah delivered by Gabriel,˺ a noble messenger-angel,

codes: ﮞ ﮟ ﮠ ﮡ ﮢ ﮣ ﮤ
text: ذِي قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِي الْعَرْشِ مَكِينٍ
english: full of power, held in honour by the Lord of the Throne,

codes: ﮥ ﮦ ﮧ ﮨ
text: مُّطَاعٍ ثَمَّ أَمِينٍ
english: obeyed there ˹in heaven˺, and trustworthy.

codes: ﮩ ﮪ ﮫ ﮬ
text: وَمَا صَاحِبُكُم بِمَجْنُونٍ
english: And your fellow man is not insane.

codes: ﮭ ﮮ ﮯ ﮰ ﮱ
text: وَلَقَدْ رَآهُ بِالْأُفُقِ الْمُبِينِ
english: And he did see that ˹angel˺ on the clear horizon,

codes: ﯓ ﯔ ﯕ ﯖ ﯗ ﯘ
text: وَمَا هُوَ عَلَى الْغَيْبِ بِضَنِينٍ
english: and he does not withhold ˹what is revealed to him of˺ the unseen.

codes: ﯙ ﯚ ﯛ ﯜ ﯝ ﯞ
text: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوْلِ شَيْطَانٍ رَّجِيمٍ
english: And this ˹Quran˺ is not the word of an outcast devil.

codes: ﯟ ﯠ ﯡ
text: فَأَيْنَ تَذْهَبُونَ
english: So what ˹other˺ path would you take?

codes: ﯢ ﯣ ﯤ ﯥ ﯦ ﯧ
text: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ لِّلْعَالَمِينَ
english: Surely this ˹Quran˺ is only a reminder to the whole world—

codes: ﯨ ﯩ ﯪ ﯫ ﯬ ﯭ
text: لِمَن شَاءَ مِنكُمْ أَن يَسْتَقِيمَ
english: to whoever of you wills to take the Straight Way.

codes: ﯮ ﯯ ﯰ ﯱ ﯲ ﯳ ﯴ ﯵ ﯶ
text: وَمَا تَشَاءُونَ إِلَّا أَن يَشَاءَ اللَّهُ رَبُّ الْعَالَمِينَ
english: But you cannot will ˹to do so˺, except by the Will of Allah, the Lord of all worlds.

codes: ﭑ ﭒ ﭓ ﭔ
text: إِذَا السَّمَاءُ انفَطَرَتْ
english: When the sky splits open,

codes: ﭕ ﭖ ﭗ ﭘ
text: وَإِذَا الْكَوَاكِبُ انتَثَرَتْ
english: and when the stars fall away,

codes: ﭙ ﭚ ﭛ ﭜ
text: وَإِذَا الْبِحَارُ فُجِّرَتْ
english: and when the seas burst forth,

codes: ﭝ ﭞ ﭟ ﭠ
text: وَإِذَا الْقُبُورُ بُعْثِرَتْ
english: and when the graves spill out,

codes: ﭡ ﭢ ﭣ ﭤ ﭥ ﭦ
text: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌ مَّا قَدَّمَتْ وَأَخَّرَتْ
english: ˹then˺ each soul will know what it has sent forth or left behind.

codes: ﭧ ﭨ ﭩ ﭪ ﭫ ﭬ ﭭ
text: يَا أَيُّهَا الْإِنسَانُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ الْكَرِيمِ
english: O humanity! What has emboldened you against your Lord, the Most Generous,

codes: ﭮ ﭯ ﭰ ﭱ ﭲ
text: الَّذِي خَلَقَكَ فَسَوَّاكَ فَعَدَلَكَ
english: Who created you, fashioned you, and perfected your design,

codes: ﭳ ﭴ ﭵ ﭶ ﭷ ﭸ ﭹ
text: فِي أَيِّ صُورَةٍ مَّا شَاءَ رَكَّبَكَ
english: moulding you in whatever form He willed?

codes: ﭺ ﭻ ﭼ ﭽ ﭾ
text: كَلَّا بَلْ تُكَذِّبُونَ بِالدِّينِ
english: But no! In fact, you deny the ˹final˺ Judgment,

codes: ﭿ ﮀ ﮁ ﮂ
text: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكُمْ لَحَافِظِينَ
english: while you are certainly observed by vigilant,

codes: ﮃ ﮄ ﮅ
text: كِرَامًا كَاتِبِينَ
english: honourable angels, recording ˹everything˺.

codes: ﮆ ﮇ ﮈ ﮉ
text: يَعْلَمُونَ مَا تَفْعَلُونَ
english: They know whatever you do.

codes: ﮊ ﮋ ﮌ ﮍ ﮎ
text: إِنَّ الْأَبْرَارَ لَفِي نَعِيمٍ
english: Indeed, the virtuous will be in bliss,

codes: ﮏ ﮐ ﮑ ﮒ ﮓ
text: وَإِنَّ الْفُجَّارَ لَفِي جَحِيمٍ
english: and the wicked will be in Hell,

codes: ﮔ ﮕ ﮖ ﮗ
text: يَصْلَوْنَهَا يَوْمَ الدِّينِ
english: burning in it on Judgment Day,

codes: ﮘ ﮙ ﮚ ﮛ ﮜ
text: وَمَا هُمْ عَنْهَا بِغَائِبِينَ
english: and they will have no escape from it.

codes: ﮝ ﮞ ﮟ ﮠ ﮡ ﮢ
text: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا يَوْمُ الدِّينِ
english: What will make you realize what Judgment Day is?

codes: ﮣ ﮤ ﮥ ﮦ ﮧ ﮨ ﮩ
text: ثُمَّ مَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا يَوْمُ الدِّينِ
english: Again, what will make you realize what Judgment Day is?

codes: ﮪ ﮫ ﮬ ﮭ ﮮ ﮯ ﮰ ﮱ ﯓ ﯔ ﯕ
text: يَوْمَ لَا تَمْلِكُ نَفْسٌ لِّنَفْسٍ شَيْئًا ۖ وَالْأَمْرُ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلَّهِ
english: ˹It is˺ the Day no soul will be of ˹any˺ benefit to another whatsoever, for all authority on that Day belongs to Allah ˹entirely˺.

codes: ﯖ ﯗ ﯘ
text: وَيْلٌ لِّلْمُطَفِّفِينَ
english: Woe to the defrauders!

codes: ﯙ ﯚ ﯛ ﯜ ﯝ ﯞ ﯟ
text: الَّذِينَ إِذَا اكْتَالُوا عَلَى النَّاسِ يَسْتَوْفُونَ
english: Those who take full measure ˹when they buy˺ from people,

codes: ﯠ ﯡ ﯢ ﯣ ﯤ ﯥ
text: وَإِذَا كَالُوهُمْ أَو وَّزَنُوهُمْ يُخْسِرُونَ
english: but give less when they measure or weigh for buyers.

codes: ﯦ ﯧ ﯨ ﯩ ﯪ ﯫ
text: أَلَا يَظُنُّ أُولَٰئِكَ أَنَّهُم مَّبْعُوثُونَ
english: Do such people not think that they will be resurrected

codes: ﯬ ﯭ ﯮ
text: لِيَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
english: for a tremendous Day—

codes: ﯯ ﯰ ﯱ ﯲ ﯳ ﯴ
text: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ النَّاسُ لِرَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
english: the Day ˹all˺ people will stand before the Lord of all worlds?

codes: ﭑ ﭒ ﭓ ﭔ ﭕ ﭖ ﭗ
text: كَلَّا إِنَّ كِتَابَ الْفُجَّارِ لَفِي سِجِّينٍ
english: But no! The wicked are certainly bound for Sijjîn ˹in the depths of Hell˺—

codes: ﭘ ﭙ ﭚ ﭛ ﭜ
text: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا سِجِّينٌ
english: and what will make you realize what Sijjîn is?—

codes: ﭝ ﭞ ﭟ
text: كِتَابٌ مَّرْقُومٌ
english: a fate ˹already˺ sealed.

codes: ﭠ ﭡ ﭢ ﭣ
text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
english: Woe on that Day to the deniers—

codes: ﭤ ﭥ ﭦ ﭧ ﭨ
text: الَّذِينَ يُكَذِّبُونَ بِيَوْمِ الدِّينِ
english: those who deny Judgment Day!

codes: ﭩ ﭪ ﭫ ﭬ ﭭ ﭮ ﭯ ﭰ
text: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعْتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ
english: None would deny it except every evildoing transgressor.

codes: ﭱ ﭲ ﭳ ﭴ ﭵ ﭶ ﭷ ﭸ
text: إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ آيَاتُنَا قَالَ أَسَاطِيرُ الْأَوَّلِينَ
english: Whenever Our revelations are recited to them, they say, “Ancient fables!”

codes: ﭹ ﭺ ﭻ ﭼ ﭽ ﭾ ﭿ ﮀ ﮁ ﮂ ﮃ
text: كَلَّا ۖ بَلْ ۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُوا يَكْسِبُونَ
english: But no! In fact, their hearts have been stained by all ˹the evil˺ they used to commit!

codes: ﮄ ﮅ ﮆ ﮇ ﮈ ﮉ ﮊ
text: كَلَّا إِنَّهُمْ عَن رَّبِّهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ لَّمَحْجُوبُونَ
english: Undoubtedly, they will be sealed off from their Lord on that Day.

codes: ﮋ ﮌ ﮍ ﮎ ﮏ
text: ثُمَّ إِنَّهُمْ لَصَالُو الْجَحِيمِ
english: Moreover, they will surely burn in Hell,

codes: ﮐ ﮑ ﮒ ﮓ ﮔ ﮕ ﮖ ﮗ
text: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَٰذَا الَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِ تُكَذِّبُونَ
english: and be told, “This is what you used to deny.”

codes: ﮘ ﮙ ﮚ ﮛ ﮜ ﮝ ﮞ
text: كَلَّا إِنَّ كِتَابَ الْأَبْرَارِ لَفِي عِلِّيِّينَ
english: But no! The virtuous are certainly bound for ’Illiyûn ˹in elevated Gardens˺—

codes: ﮟ ﮠ ﮡ ﮢ ﮣ
text: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا عِلِّيُّونَ
english: and what will make you realize what ’Illiyûn is?—

codes: ﮤ ﮥ ﮦ
text: كِتَابٌ مَّرْقُومٌ
english: a fate ˹already˺ sealed,

codes: ﮧ ﮨ ﮩ
text: يَشْهَدُهُ الْمُقَرَّبُونَ
english: witnessed by those nearest ˹to Allah˺.

codes: ﮪ ﮫ ﮬ ﮭ ﮮ
text: إِنَّ الْأَبْرَارَ لَفِي نَعِيمٍ
english: Surely the virtuous will be in bliss,

codes: ﮯ ﮰ ﮱ ﯓ
text: عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
english: ˹seated˺ on ˹canopied˺ couches, gazing around.

codes: ﯔ ﯕ ﯖ ﯗ ﯘ ﯙ
text: تَعْرِفُ فِي وُجُوهِهِمْ نَضْرَةَ النَّعِيمِ
english: You will recognize on their faces the glow of delight.

codes: ﯚ ﯛ ﯜ ﯝ ﯞ
text: يُسْقَوْنَ مِن رَّحِيقٍ مَّخْتُومٍ
english: They will be given a drink of sealed, pure wine,

codes: ﯟ ﯠ ﯡ ﯢ ﯣ ﯤ ﯥ ﯦ
text: خِتَامُهُ مِسْكٌ ۚ وَفِي ذَٰلِكَ فَلْيَتَنَافَسِ الْمُتَنَافِسُونَ
english: whose last sip will smell like musk. So let whoever aspires to this strive ˹diligently˺.

codes: ﯧ ﯨ ﯩ ﯪ
text: وَمِزَاجُهُ مِن تَسْنِيمٍ
english: And this drink’s flavour will come from Tasnîm—

codes: ﯫ ﯬ ﯭ ﯮ ﯯ
text: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا الْمُقَرَّبُونَ
english: a spring from which those nearest ˹to Allah˺ will drink.

codes: ﯰ ﯱ ﯲ ﯳ ﯴ ﯵ ﯶ ﯷ ﯸ
text: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ أَجْرَمُوا كَانُوا مِنَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا يَضْحَكُونَ
english: Indeed, the wicked used to laugh at the believers,

codes: ﯹ ﯺ ﯻ ﯼ ﯽ
text: وَإِذَا مَرُّوا بِهِمْ يَتَغَامَزُونَ
english: wink to one another whenever they passed by,

codes: ﯾ ﯿ ﰀ ﰁ ﰂ ﰃ ﰄ
text: وَإِذَا انقَلَبُوا إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِمُ انقَلَبُوا فَكِهِينَ
english: and muse ˹over these exploits˺ upon returning to their own people.

codes: ﰅ ﰆ ﰇ ﰈ ﰉ ﰊ ﰋ
text: وَإِذَا رَأَوْهُمْ قَالُوا إِنَّ هَٰؤُلَاءِ لَضَالُّونَ
english: And when they saw the faithful, they would say, “These ˹people˺ are truly astray,”

codes: ﰌ ﰍ ﰎ ﰏ ﰐ
text: وَمَا أُرْسِلُوا عَلَيْهِمْ حَافِظِينَ
english: even though they were not sent as keepers over the believers.

codes: ﰑ ﰒ ﰓ ﰔ ﰕ ﰖ ﰗ
text: فَالْيَوْمَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا مِنَ الْكُفَّارِ يَضْحَكُونَ
english: But on that Day the believers will be laughing at the disbelievers,

codes: ﭑ ﭒ ﭓ ﭔ
text: عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
english: as they sit on ˹canopied˺ couches, looking on.

codes: ﭕ ﭖ ﭗ ﭘ ﭙ ﭚ ﭛ
text: هَلْ ثُوِّبَ الْكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُوا يَفْعَلُونَ
english: ˹The believers will be asked,˺ “Have the disbelievers ˹not˺ been paid back for what they used to do?”

codes: ﭜ ﭝ ﭞ ﭟ
text: إِذَا السَّمَاءُ انشَقَّتْ
english: When the sky bursts open,

codes: ﭠ ﭡ ﭢ ﭣ
text: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ
english: obeying its Lord as it must,

codes: ﭤ ﭥ ﭦ ﭧ
text: وَإِذَا الْأَرْضُ مُدَّتْ
english: and when the earth is flattened out,

codes: ﭨ ﭩ ﭪ ﭫ ﭬ
text: وَأَلْقَتْ مَا فِيهَا وَتَخَلَّتْ
english: and ejects ˹all˺ its contents and becomes empty,

codes: ﭭ ﭮ ﭯ ﭰ
text: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ
english: obeying its Lord as it must, ˹surely you will all be judged˺.

codes: ﭱ ﭲ ﭳ ﭴ ﭵ ﭶ ﭷ ﭸ ﭹ
text: يَا أَيُّهَا الْإِنسَانُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدْحًا فَمُلَاقِيهِ
english: O humanity! Indeed, you are labouring restlessly towards your Lord, and will ˹eventually˺ meet the consequences.

codes: ﭺ ﭻ ﭼ ﭽ ﭾ ﭿ
text: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِيَ كِتَابَهُ بِيَمِينِهِ
english: As for those who are given their record in their right hand,

codes: ﮀ ﮁ ﮂ ﮃ ﮄ
text: فَسَوْفَ يُحَاسَبُ حِسَابًا يَسِيرًا
english: they will have an easy reckoning,

codes: ﮅ ﮆ ﮇ ﮈ ﮉ
text: وَيَنقَلِبُ إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِ مَسْرُورًا
english: and will return to their people joyfully.

codes: ﮊ ﮋ ﮌ ﮍ ﮎ ﮏ ﮐ
text: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِيَ كِتَابَهُ وَرَاءَ ظَهْرِهِ
english: And as for those who are given their record ˹in their left hand˺ from behind their backs,

codes: ﮑ ﮒ ﮓ ﮔ
text: فَسَوْفَ يَدْعُو ثُبُورًا
english: they will cry for ˹instant˺ destruction,

codes: ﮕ ﮖ ﮗ
text: وَيَصْلَىٰ سَعِيرًا
english: and will burn in the blazing Fire.

codes: ﮘ ﮙ ﮚ ﮛ ﮜ ﮝ
text: إِنَّهُ كَانَ فِي أَهْلِهِ مَسْرُورًا
english: For they used to be prideful among their people,

codes: ﮞ ﮟ ﮠ ﮡ ﮢ ﮣ
text: إِنَّهُ ظَنَّ أَن لَّن يَحُورَ
english: thinking they would never return ˹to Allah˺.

codes: ﮤ ﮥ ﮦ ﮧ ﮨ ﮩ ﮪ
text: بَلَىٰ إِنَّ رَبَّهُ كَانَ بِهِ بَصِيرًا
english: Yes ˹they would˺! Surely their Lord has always been All-Seeing of them.

codes: ﮫ ﮬ ﮭ ﮮ
text: فَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِالشَّفَقِ
english: So, I do swear by the twilight!

codes: ﮯ ﮰ ﮱ ﯓ
text: وَاللَّيْلِ وَمَا وَسَقَ
english: And by the night and whatever it envelops!

codes: ﯔ ﯕ ﯖ ﯗ
text: وَالْقَمَرِ إِذَا اتَّسَقَ
english: And by the moon when it waxes full!

codes: ﯘ ﯙ ﯚ ﯛ ﯜ
text: لَتَرْكَبُنَّ طَبَقًا عَن طَبَقٍ
english: You will certainly pass from one state to another.

codes: ﯝ ﯞ ﯟ ﯠ ﯡ
text: فَمَا لَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
english: So what is the matter with them that they do not believe,

codes: ﯢ ﯣ ﯤ ﯥ ﯦ ﯧ ﯨ ﯩ
text: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيْهِمُ الْقُرْآنُ لَا يَسْجُدُونَ
english: and when the Quran is recited to them, they do not bow down ˹in submission˺?

codes: ﯪ ﯫ ﯬ ﯭ ﯮ
text: بَلِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا يُكَذِّبُونَ
english: In fact, the disbelievers persist in denial.

codes: ﯯ ﯰ ﯱ ﯲ ﯳ
text: وَاللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يُوعُونَ
english: But Allah knows best whatever they hide.

codes: ﯴ ﯵ ﯶ ﯷ
text: فَبَشِّرْهُم بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
english: So give them good news of a painful punishment.

codes: ﯸ ﯹ ﯺ ﯻ ﯼ ﯽ ﯾ ﯿ ﰀ ﰁ
text: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ لَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ
english: But those who believe and do good will have a never-ending reward.

codes: ﭑ ﭒ ﭓ ﭔ
text: وَالسَّمَاءِ ذَاتِ الْبُرُوجِ
english: By the sky full of constellations,

codes: ﭕ ﭖ ﭗ
text: وَالْيَوْمِ الْمَوْعُودِ
english: and the promised Day ˹of Judgment˺,

codes: ﭘ ﭙ ﭚ
text: وَشَاهِدٍ وَمَشْهُودٍ
english: and the witness and what is witnessed!

codes: ﭛ ﭜ ﭝ ﭞ
text: قُتِلَ أَصْحَابُ الْأُخْدُودِ
english: Condemned are the makers of the ditch—

codes: ﭟ ﭠ ﭡ ﭢ
text: النَّارِ ذَاتِ الْوَقُودِ
english: the fire ˹pit˺, filled with fuel—

codes: ﭣ ﭤ ﭥ ﭦ ﭧ
text: إِذْ هُمْ عَلَيْهَا قُعُودٌ
english: when they sat around it,

codes: ﭨ ﭩ ﭪ ﭫ ﭬ ﭭ ﭮ
text: وَهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفْعَلُونَ بِالْمُؤْمِنِينَ شُهُودٌ
english: watching what they had ˹ordered to be˺ done to the believers,

codes: ﭯ ﭰ ﭱ ﭲ ﭳ ﭴ ﭵ ﭶ ﭷ ﭸ
text: وَمَا نَقَمُوا مِنْهُمْ إِلَّا أَن يُؤْمِنُوا بِاللَّهِ الْعَزِيزِ الْحَمِيدِ
english: who they resented for no reason other than belief in Allah—the Almighty, the Praiseworthy—

codes: ﭹ ﭺ ﭻ ﭼ ﭽ ﭾ ﭿ ﮀ ﮁ ﮂ ﮃ ﮄ
text: الَّذِي لَهُ مُلْكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ شَهِيدٌ
english: ˹the One˺ to Whom belongs the kingdom of the heavens and earth. And Allah is a Witness over all things.

codes: ﮅ ﮆ ﮇ ﮈ ﮉ ﮊ ﮋ ﮌ ﮍ ﮎ ﮏ ﮐ ﮑ ﮒ ﮓ
text: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ فَتَنُوا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَتُوبُوا فَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ الْحَرِيقِ
english: Those who persecute the believing men and women and then do not repent will certainly suffer the punishment of Hell and the torment of burning.

codes: ﮔ ﮕ ﮖ ﮗ ﮘ ﮙ ﮚ ﮛ ﮜ ﮝ ﮞ ﮟ ﮠ ﮡ ﮢ ﮣ
text: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ لَهُمْ جَنَّاتٌ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ الْفَوْزُ الْكَبِيرُ
english: Surely those who believe and do good will have Gardens under which rivers flow. That is the greatest triumph.

codes: ﮤ ﮥ ﮦ ﮧ ﮨ
text: إِنَّ بَطْشَ رَبِّكَ لَشَدِيدٌ
english: Indeed, the ˹crushing˺ grip of your Lord is severe.

codes: ﮩ ﮪ ﮫ ﮬ ﮭ
text: إِنَّهُ هُوَ يُبْدِئُ وَيُعِيدُ
english: ˹For˺ He is certainly the One Who originates and resurrects ˹all˺.

codes: ﮮ ﮯ ﮰ ﮱ
text: وَهُوَ الْغَفُورُ الْوَدُودُ
english: And He is the All-Forgiving, All-Loving—

codes: ﯓ ﯔ ﯕ ﯖ
text: ذُو الْعَرْشِ الْمَجِيدُ
english: Lord of the Throne, the All-Glorious,

codes: ﯗ ﯘ ﯙ ﯚ
text: فَعَّالٌ لِّمَا يُرِيدُ
english: Doer of whatever He wills.

codes: ﯛ ﯜ ﯝ ﯞ ﯟ
text: هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ الْجُنُودِ
english: Has the story of the ˹destroyed˺ forces reached you ˹O Prophet˺—

codes: ﯠ ﯡ ﯢ
text: فِرْعَوْنَ وَثَمُودَ
english: ˹the forces of˺ Pharaoh and Thamûd?

codes: ﯣ ﯤ ﯥ ﯦ ﯧ ﯨ
text: بَلِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا فِي تَكْذِيبٍ
english: Yet the disbelievers ˹still˺ persist in denial.

codes: ﯩ ﯪ ﯫ ﯬ ﯭ
text: وَاللَّهُ مِن وَرَائِهِم مُّحِيطٌ
english: But Allah encompasses them from all sides.

codes: ﯮ ﯯ ﯰ ﯱ ﯲ
text: بَلْ هُوَ قُرْآنٌ مَّجِيدٌ
english: In fact, this is a glorious Quran,

codes: ﯳ ﯴ ﯵ ﯶ
text: فِي لَوْحٍ مَّحْفُوظٍ
english: ˹recorded˺ in a Preserved Tablet.

codes: ﭑ ﭒ ﭓ
text: وَالسَّمَاءِ وَالطَّارِقِ
english: By the heaven and the nightly star!

codes: ﭔ ﭕ ﭖ ﭗ ﭘ
text: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الطَّارِقُ
english: And what will make you realize what the nightly star is?

codes: ﭙ ﭚ ﭛ
text: النَّجْمُ الثَّاقِبُ
english: ˹It is˺ the star of piercing brightness.

codes: ﭜ ﭝ ﭞ ﭟ ﭠ ﭡ ﭢ
text: إِن كُلُّ نَفْسٍ لَّمَّا عَلَيْهَا حَافِظٌ
english: There is no soul without a vigilant angel ˹recording everything˺.

codes: ﭣ ﭤ ﭥ ﭦ ﭧ
text: فَلْيَنظُرِ الْإِنسَانُ مِمَّ خُلِقَ
english: Let people then consider what they were created from!

codes: ﭨ ﭩ ﭪ ﭫ ﭬ
text: خُلِقَ مِن مَّاءٍ دَافِقٍ
english: ˹They were˺ created from a spurting fluid,

codes: ﭭ ﭮ ﭯ ﭰ ﭱ ﭲ
text: يَخْرُجُ مِن بَيْنِ الصُّلْبِ وَالتَّرَائِبِ
english: stemming from between the backbone and the ribcage.

codes: ﭳ ﭴ ﭵ ﭶ ﭷ
text: إِنَّهُ عَلَىٰ رَجْعِهِ لَقَادِرٌ
english: Surely He is fully capable of bringing them back ˹to life˺

codes: ﭸ ﭹ ﭺ ﭻ
text: يَوْمَ تُبْلَى السَّرَائِرُ
english: on the Day all secrets will be disclosed.

codes: ﭼ ﭽ ﭾ ﭿ ﮀ ﮁ ﮂ
text: فَمَا لَهُ مِن قُوَّةٍ وَلَا نَاصِرٍ
english: Then one will have neither power nor ˹any˺ helper.

codes: ﮃ ﮄ ﮅ ﮆ
text: وَالسَّمَاءِ ذَاتِ الرَّجْعِ
english: By the sky with its recurring cycles,

codes: ﮇ ﮈ ﮉ ﮊ
text: وَالْأَرْضِ ذَاتِ الصَّدْعِ
english: and the earth with its sprouting plants!

codes: ﮋ ﮌ ﮍ ﮎ
text: إِنَّهُ لَقَوْلٌ فَصْلٌ
english: Surely this ˹Quran˺ is a decisive word,

codes: ﮏ ﮐ ﮑ ﮒ
text: وَمَا هُوَ بِالْهَزْلِ
english: and is not to be taken lightly.

codes: ﮓ ﮔ ﮕ ﮖ
text: إِنَّهُمْ يَكِيدُونَ كَيْدًا
english: They are certainly devising ˹evil˺ plans,

codes: ﮗ ﮘ ﮙ
text: وَأَكِيدُ كَيْدًا
english: but I too am planning.

codes: ﮚ ﮛ ﮜ ﮝ ﮞ
text: فَمَهِّلِ الْكَافِرِينَ أَمْهِلْهُمْ رُوَيْدًا
english: So bear with the disbelievers ˹O Prophet˺. Let them be for ˹just˺ a little while.

codes: ﮟ ﮠ ﮡ ﮢ ﮣ
text: سَبِّحِ اسْمَ رَبِّكَ الْأَعْلَى
english: Glorify the Name of your Lord, the Most High,

codes: ﮤ ﮥ ﮦ ﮧ
text: الَّذِي خَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
english: Who created and ˹perfectly˺ fashioned ˹all˺,

codes: ﮨ ﮩ ﮪ ﮫ
text: وَالَّذِي قَدَّرَ فَهَدَىٰ
english: and Who ordained precisely and inspired accordingly,

codes: ﮬ ﮭ ﮮ ﮯ
text: وَالَّذِي أَخْرَجَ الْمَرْعَىٰ
english: and Who brings forth ˹green˺ pasture,

codes: ﮰ ﮱ ﯓ ﯔ
text: فَجَعَلَهُ غُثَاءً أَحْوَىٰ
english: then reduces it to withered chaff.

codes: ﯕ ﯖ ﯗ ﯘ
text: سَنُقْرِئُكَ فَلَا تَنسَىٰ
english: We will have you recite ˹the Quran, O  Prophet,˺ so you will not forget ˹any of it˺,

codes: ﯙ ﯚ ﯛ ﯜ ﯝ ﯞ ﯟ ﯠ ﯡ ﯢ ﯣ
text: إِلَّا مَا شَاءَ اللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّهُ يَعْلَمُ الْجَهْرَ وَمَا يَخْفَىٰ
english: unless Allah wills otherwise. He surely knows what is open and what is hidden.

codes: ﯤ ﯥ ﯦ
text: وَنُيَسِّرُكَ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ
english: We will facilitate for you the Way of Ease.

codes: ﯧ ﯨ ﯩ ﯪ ﯫ
text: فَذَكِّرْ إِن نَّفَعَتِ الذِّكْرَىٰ
english: So ˹always˺ remind ˹with the Quran˺—˹even˺ if the reminder is beneficial ˹only to some˺.

codes: ﯬ ﯭ ﯮ ﯯ
text: سَيَذَّكَّرُ مَن يَخْشَىٰ
english: Those in awe ˹of Allah˺ will be mindful ˹of it˺.

codes: ﯰ ﯱ ﯲ
text: وَيَتَجَنَّبُهَا الْأَشْقَى
english: But it will be shunned by the most wretched,

codes: ﯳ ﯴ ﯵ ﯶ ﯷ
text: الَّذِي يَصْلَى النَّارَ الْكُبْرَىٰ
english: who will burn in the greatest Fire,

codes: ﯸ ﯹ ﯺ ﯻ ﯼ ﯽ ﯾ
text: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحْيَىٰ
english: where they will not ˹be able to˺ live or die.

codes: ﯿ ﰀ ﰁ ﰂ ﰃ
text: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ
english: Successful indeed are those who purify themselves,

codes: ﰄ ﰅ ﰆ ﰇ ﰈ
text: وَذَكَرَ اسْمَ رَبِّهِ فَصَلَّىٰ
english: remember the Name of their Lord, and pray.

codes: ﭑ ﭒ ﭓ ﭔ ﭕ
text: بَلْ تُؤْثِرُونَ الْحَيَاةَ الدُّنْيَا
english: But you ˹deniers only˺ prefer the life of this world,

codes: ﭖ ﭗ ﭘ ﭙ
text: وَالْآخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ وَأَبْقَىٰ
english: even though the Hereafter is far better and more lasting.

codes: ﭚ ﭛ ﭜ ﭝ ﭞ ﭟ
text: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَفِي الصُّحُفِ الْأُولَىٰ
english: This is certainly ˹mentioned˺ in the earlier Scriptures—

codes: ﭠ ﭡ ﭢ ﭣ
text: صُحُفِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَمُوسَىٰ
english: the Scriptures of Abraham and Moses.

codes: ﭤ ﭥ ﭦ ﭧ ﭨ
text: هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ الْغَاشِيَةِ
english: Has the news of the Overwhelming Event reached you ˹O Prophet˺?

codes: ﭩ ﭪ ﭫ ﭬ
text: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ خَاشِعَةٌ
english: On that Day ˹some˺ faces will be downcast,

codes: ﭭ ﭮ ﭯ
text: عَامِلَةٌ نَّاصِبَةٌ
english: ˹totally˺ overburdened, exhausted,

codes: ﭰ ﭱ ﭲ ﭳ
text: تَصْلَىٰ نَارًا حَامِيَةً
english: burning in a scorching Fire,

codes: ﭴ ﭵ ﭶ ﭷ ﭸ
text: تُسْقَىٰ مِنْ عَيْنٍ آنِيَةٍ
english: left to drink from a scalding spring.

codes: ﭹ ﭺ ﭻ ﭼ ﭽ ﭾ ﭿ
text: لَّيْسَ لَهُمْ طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِن ضَرِيعٍ
english: They will have no food except a foul, thorny shrub,

codes: ﮀ ﮁ ﮂ ﮃ ﮄ ﮅ ﮆ
text: لَّا يُسْمِنُ وَلَا يُغْنِي مِن جُوعٍ
english: neither nourishing nor satisfying hunger.

codes: ﮇ ﮈ ﮉ ﮊ
text: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ نَّاعِمَةٌ
english: On that Day ˹other˺ faces will be glowing with bliss,

codes: ﮋ ﮌ ﮍ
text: لِّسَعْيِهَا رَاضِيَةٌ
english: ˹fully˺ pleased with their striving,

codes: ﮎ ﮏ ﮐ ﮑ
text: فِي جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٍ
english: in an elevated Garden,

codes: ﮒ ﮓ ﮔ ﮕ ﮖ
text: لَّا تَسْمَعُ فِيهَا لَاغِيَةً
english: where no idle talk will be heard.

codes: ﮗ ﮘ ﮙ ﮚ
text: فِيهَا عَيْنٌ جَارِيَةٌ
english: In it will be a running spring,

codes: ﮛ ﮜ ﮝ ﮞ
text: فِيهَا سُرُرٌ مَّرْفُوعَةٌ
english: along with thrones raised high,

codes: ﮟ ﮠ ﮡ
text: وَأَكْوَابٌ مَّوْضُوعَةٌ
english: and cups set at hand,

codes: ﮢ ﮣ ﮤ
text: وَنَمَارِقُ مَصْفُوفَةٌ
english: and ˹fine˺ cushions lined up,

codes: ﮥ ﮦ ﮧ
text: وَزَرَابِيُّ مَبْثُوثَةٌ
english: and ˹splendid˺ carpets spread out.

codes: ﮨ ﮩ ﮪ ﮫ ﮬ ﮭ ﮮ
text: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى الْإِبِلِ كَيْفَ خُلِقَتْ
english: Do they not ever reflect on camels—how they were ˹masterfully˺ created;

codes: ﮯ ﮰ ﮱ ﯓ ﯔ
text: وَإِلَى السَّمَاءِ كَيْفَ رُفِعَتْ
english: and the sky—how it was raised ˹high˺;

codes: ﯕ ﯖ ﯗ ﯘ ﯙ
text: وَإِلَى الْجِبَالِ كَيْفَ نُصِبَتْ
english: and the mountains—how they were firmly set up;

codes: ﯚ ﯛ ﯜ ﯝ ﯞ
text: وَإِلَى الْأَرْضِ كَيْفَ سُطِحَتْ
english: and the earth—how it was levelled out?

codes: ﯟ ﯠ ﯡ ﯢ ﯣ
text: فَذَكِّرْ إِنَّمَا أَنتَ مُذَكِّرٌ
english: So, ˹continue to˺ remind ˹all, O  Prophet˺, for your duty is only to remind.

codes: ﯤ ﯥ ﯦ ﯧ
text: لَّسْتَ عَلَيْهِم بِمُصَيْطِرٍ
english: You are not ˹there˺ to compel them ˹to believe˺.

codes: ﯨ ﯩ ﯪ ﯫ ﯬ
text: إِلَّا مَن تَوَلَّىٰ وَكَفَرَ
english: But whoever turns away, persisting in disbelief,

codes: ﯭ ﯮ ﯯ ﯰ ﯱ
text: فَيُعَذِّبُهُ اللَّهُ الْعَذَابَ الْأَكْبَرَ
english: then Allah will inflict upon them the major punishment.

codes: ﯲ ﯳ ﯴ ﯵ
text: إِنَّ إِلَيْنَا إِيَابَهُمْ
english: Surely to Us is their return,

codes: ﯶ ﯷ ﯸ ﯹ ﯺ
text: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا حِسَابَهُم
english: then surely with Us is their reckoning.

codes: ﭑ ﭒ
text: وَالْفَجْرِ
english: By the dawn,

codes: ﭓ ﭔ ﭕ
text: وَلَيَالٍ عَشْرٍ
english: and the ten nights,

codes: ﭖ ﭗ ﭘ
text: وَالشَّفْعِ وَالْوَتْرِ
english: and the even and the odd,

codes: ﭙ ﭚ ﭛ ﭜ
text: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا يَسْرِ
english: and the night when it passes!

codes: ﭝ ﭞ ﭟ ﭠ ﭡ ﭢ ﭣ
text: هَلْ فِي ذَٰلِكَ قَسَمٌ لِّذِي حِجْرٍ
english: Is all this ˹not˺ a sufficient oath for those who have sense?

codes: ﭤ ﭥ ﭦ ﭧ ﭨ ﭩ ﭪ
text: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِعَادٍ
english: Did you not see how your Lord dealt with ’Ȃd—

codes: ﭫ ﭬ ﭭ ﭮ
text: إِرَمَ ذَاتِ الْعِمَادِ
english: ˹the people˺ of Iram—with ˹their˺ great stature,

codes: ﭯ ﭰ ﭱ ﭲ ﭳ ﭴ ﭵ
text: الَّتِي لَمْ يُخْلَقْ مِثْلُهَا فِي الْبِلَادِ
english: unmatched in any other land;

codes: ﭶ ﭷ ﭸ ﭹ ﭺ ﭻ
text: وَثَمُودَ الَّذِينَ جَابُوا الصَّخْرَ بِالْوَادِ
english: and Thamûd who carved ˹their homes into˺ the rocks in the ˹Stone˺ Valley;

codes: ﭼ ﭽ ﭾ ﭿ
text: وَفِرْعَوْنَ ذِي الْأَوْتَادِ
english: and the Pharaoh of mighty structures?

codes: ﮀ ﮁ ﮂ ﮃ ﮄ
text: الَّذِينَ طَغَوْا فِي الْبِلَادِ
english: They all transgressed throughout the land,

codes: ﮅ ﮆ ﮇ ﮈ
text: فَأَكْثَرُوا فِيهَا الْفَسَادَ
english: spreading much corruption there.

codes: ﮉ ﮊ ﮋ ﮌ ﮍ ﮎ
text: فَصَبَّ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّكَ سَوْطَ عَذَابٍ
english: So your Lord unleashed on them a scourge of punishment.

codes: ﮏ ﮐ ﮑ ﮒ
text: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَبِالْمِرْصَادِ
english: ˹For˺ your Lord is truly vigilant.

codes: ﮓ ﮔ ﮕ ﮖ ﮗ ﮘ ﮙ ﮚ ﮛ ﮜ ﮝ ﮞ
text: فَأَمَّا الْإِنسَانُ إِذَا مَا ابْتَلَاهُ رَبُّهُ فَأَكْرَمَهُ وَنَعَّمَهُ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّي أَكْرَمَنِ
english: Now, whenever a human being is tested by their Lord through ˹His˺ generosity and blessings, they boast, “My Lord has ˹deservedly˺ honoured me!”

codes: ﮟ ﮠ ﮡ ﮢ ﮣ ﮤ ﮥ ﮦ ﮧ ﮨ ﮩ
text: وَأَمَّا إِذَا مَا ابْتَلَاهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَيْهِ رِزْقَهُ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّي أَهَانَنِ
english: But when He tests them by limiting their provision, they protest, “My Lord has ˹undeservedly˺ humiliated me!”

codes: ﮪ ﮫ ﮬ ﮭ ﮮ ﮯ ﮰ
text: كَلَّا ۖ بَل لَّا تُكْرِمُونَ الْيَتِيمَ
english: Absolutely not! In fact, you are not ˹even˺ gracious to the orphan,

codes: ﮱ ﯓ ﯔ ﯕ ﯖ ﯗ
text: وَلَا تَحَاضُّونَ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ الْمِسْكِينِ
english: nor do you urge one another to feed the poor.

codes: ﯘ ﯙ ﯚ ﯛ ﯜ
text: وَتَأْكُلُونَ التُّرَاثَ أَكْلًا لَّمًّا
english: And you devour ˹others’˺ inheritance greedily,

codes: ﯝ ﯞ ﯟ ﯠ ﯡ
text: وَتُحِبُّونَ الْمَالَ حُبًّا جَمًّا
english: and love wealth fervently.

codes: ﯢ ﯣ ﯤ ﯥ ﯦ ﯧ ﯨ
text: كَلَّا إِذَا دُكَّتِ الْأَرْضُ دَكًّا دَكًّا
english: Enough! When the earth is entirely crushed over and over,

codes: ﯩ ﯪ ﯫ ﯬ ﯭ ﯮ
text: وَجَاءَ رَبُّكَ وَالْمَلَكُ صَفًّا صَفًّا
english: and your Lord comes ˹to judge˺ with angels, rank upon rank,

codes: ﯯ ﯰ ﯱ ﯲ ﯳ ﯴ ﯵ ﯶ ﯷ ﯸ ﯹ
text: وَجِيءَ يَوْمَئِذٍ بِجَهَنَّمَ ۚ يَوْمَئِذٍ يَتَذَكَّرُ الْإِنسَانُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ الذِّكْرَىٰ
english: and Hell is brought forth on that Day—this is when every ˹disbelieving˺ person will remember ˹their own sins˺. But what is the use of remembering then?

codes: ﭑ ﭒ ﭓ ﭔ ﭕ
text: يَقُولُ يَا لَيْتَنِي قَدَّمْتُ لِحَيَاتِي
english: They will cry, “I wish I had sent forth ˹something good˺ for my ˹true˺ life.”

codes: ﭖ ﭗ ﭘ ﭙ ﭚ ﭛ
text: فَيَوْمَئِذٍ لَّا يُعَذِّبُ عَذَابَهُ أَحَدٌ
english: On that Day He will punish ˹them˺ severely, like no other,

codes: ﭜ ﭝ ﭞ ﭟ ﭠ
text: وَلَا يُوثِقُ وَثَاقَهُ أَحَدٌ
english: and bind ˹them˺ tightly, like no other.

codes: ﭡ ﭢ ﭣ ﭤ
text: يَا أَيَّتُهَا النَّفْسُ الْمُطْمَئِنَّةُ
english: ˹Allah will say to the righteous,˺ “O tranquil soul!

codes: ﭥ ﭦ ﭧ ﭨ ﭩ ﭪ
text: ارْجِعِي إِلَىٰ رَبِّكِ رَاضِيَةً مَّرْضِيَّةً
english: Return to your Lord, well pleased ˹with Him˺ and well pleasing ˹to Him˺.

codes: ﭫ ﭬ ﭭ ﭮ
text: فَادْخُلِي فِي عِبَادِي
english: So join My servants,

codes: ﭯ ﭰ ﭱ
text: وَادْخُلِي جَنَّتِي
english: and enter My Paradise.”

codes: ﭲ ﭳ ﭴ ﭵ ﭶ
text: لَا أُقْسِمُ بِهَٰذَا الْبَلَدِ
english: I do swear by this city ˹of Mecca˺—

codes: ﭷ ﭸ ﭹ ﭺ ﭻ
text: وَأَنتَ حِلٌّ بِهَٰذَا الْبَلَدِ
english: even though you ˹O Prophet˺ are subject to abuse in this city—

codes: ﭼ ﭽ ﭾ ﭿ
text: وَوَالِدٍ وَمَا وَلَدَ
english: and by every parent and ˹their˺ child!

codes: ﮀ ﮁ ﮂ ﮃ ﮄ ﮅ
text: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ فِي كَبَدٍ
english: Indeed, We have created humanity in ˹constant˺ struggle.

codes: ﮆ ﮇ ﮈ ﮉ ﮊ ﮋ ﮌ
text: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّن يَقْدِرَ عَلَيْهِ أَحَدٌ
english: Do they think that no one has power over them,

codes: ﮍ ﮎ ﮏ ﮐ ﮑ
text: يَقُولُ أَهْلَكْتُ مَالًا لُّبَدًا
english: boasting, “I have wasted enormous wealth!”?

codes: ﮒ ﮓ ﮔ ﮕ ﮖ ﮗ
text: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّمْ يَرَهُ أَحَدٌ
english: Do they think that no one sees them?

codes: ﮘ ﮙ ﮚ ﮛ ﮜ
text: أَلَمْ نَجْعَل لَّهُ عَيْنَيْنِ
english: Have We not given them two eyes,

codes: ﮝ ﮞ ﮟ
text: وَلِسَانًا وَشَفَتَيْنِ
english: a tongue, and two lips;

codes: ﮠ ﮡ ﮢ
text: وَهَدَيْنَاهُ النَّجْدَيْنِ
english: and shown them the two ways ˹of right and wrong˺?

codes: ﮣ ﮤ ﮥ ﮦ
text: فَلَا اقْتَحَمَ الْعَقَبَةَ
english: If only they had attempted the challenging path ˹of goodness instead˺!

codes: ﮧ ﮨ ﮩ ﮪ ﮫ
text: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الْعَقَبَةُ
english: And what will make you realize what ˹attempting˺ the challenging path is?

codes: ﮬ ﮭ ﮮ
text: فَكُّ رَقَبَةٍ
english: It is to free a slave;

codes: ﮯ ﮰ ﮱ ﯓ ﯔ ﯕ ﯖ
text: أَوْ إِطْعَامٌ فِي يَوْمٍ ذِي مَسْغَبَةٍ
english: or to give food in times of famine

codes: ﯗ ﯘ ﯙ ﯚ
text: يَتِيمًا ذَا مَقْرَبَةٍ
english: to an orphaned relative

codes: ﯛ ﯜ ﯝ ﯞ ﯟ
text: أَوْ مِسْكِينًا ذَا مَتْرَبَةٍ
english: or to a poor person in distress;

codes: ﯠ ﯡ ﯢ ﯣ ﯤ ﯥ ﯦ ﯧ ﯨ ﯩ
text: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالصَّبْرِ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالْمَرْحَمَةِ
english: and—above all—to be one of those who have faith and urge each other to perseverance and urge each other to compassion.

codes: ﯪ ﯫ ﯬ ﯭ
text: أُولَٰئِكَ أَصْحَابُ الْمَيْمَنَةِ
english: These are the people of the right.

codes: ﯮ ﯯ ﯰ ﯱ ﯲ ﯳ ﯴ
text: وَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا بِآيَاتِنَا هُمْ أَصْحَابُ الْمَشْأَمَةِ
english: As for those who deny Our signs, they are the people of the left.

codes: ﯵ ﯶ ﯷ ﯸ
text: عَلَيْهِمْ نَارٌ مُّؤْصَدَةٌ
english: The Fire will be sealed over them.

codes: ﭑ ﭒ ﭓ
text: وَالشَّمْسِ وَضُحَاهَا
english: By the sun and its brightness,

codes: ﭔ ﭕ ﭖ ﭗ
text: وَالْقَمَرِ إِذَا تَلَاهَا
english: and the moon as it follows it,

codes: ﭘ ﭙ ﭚ ﭛ
text: وَالنَّهَارِ إِذَا جَلَّاهَا
english: and the day as it unveils it,

codes: ﭜ ﭝ ﭞ ﭟ
text: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَاهَا
english: and the night as it conceals it!

codes: ﭠ ﭡ ﭢ ﭣ
text: وَالسَّمَاءِ وَمَا بَنَاهَا
english: And by heaven and ˹the One˺ Who built it,

codes: ﭤ ﭥ ﭦ ﭧ
text: وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا طَحَاهَا
english: and the earth and ˹the One˺ Who spread it!

codes: ﭨ ﭩ ﭪ ﭫ
text: وَنَفْسٍ وَمَا سَوَّاهَا
english: And by the soul and ˹the One˺ Who fashioned it,

codes: ﭬ ﭭ ﭮ ﭯ
text: فَأَلْهَمَهَا فُجُورَهَا وَتَقْوَاهَا
english: then with ˹the knowledge of˺ right and wrong inspired it!

codes: ﭰ ﭱ ﭲ ﭳ ﭴ
text: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَن زَكَّاهَا
english: Successful indeed is the one who purifies their soul,

codes: ﭵ ﭶ ﭷ ﭸ ﭹ
text: وَقَدْ خَابَ مَن دَسَّاهَا
english: and doomed is the one who corrupts it!

codes: ﭺ ﭻ ﭼ ﭽ
text: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِطَغْوَاهَا
english: Thamûd rejected ˹the truth˺ out of arrogance,

codes: ﭾ ﭿ ﮀ ﮁ
text: إِذِ انبَعَثَ أَشْقَاهَا
english: when the most wicked of them was roused ˹to kill the she-camel˺.

codes: ﮂ ﮃ ﮄ ﮅ ﮆ ﮇ ﮈ ﮉ
text: فَقَالَ لَهُمْ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ نَاقَةَ اللَّهِ وَسُقْيَاهَا
english: But the messenger of Allah warned them, “˹Do not disturb˺ Allah’s camel and her ˹turn to˺ drink!”

codes: ﮊ ﮋ ﮌ ﮍ ﮎ ﮏ ﮐ ﮑ
text: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمْدَمَ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّهُم بِذَنبِهِمْ فَسَوَّاهَا
english: Still they defied him and slaughtered her. So their Lord crushed them for their crime, levelling all to the ground.

codes: ﮒ ﮓ ﮔ ﮕ
text: وَلَا يَخَافُ عُقْبَاهَا
english: He has no fear of consequences.

codes: ﮖ ﮗ ﮘ ﮙ
text: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَىٰ
english: By the night when it covers,

codes: ﮚ ﮛ ﮜ ﮝ
text: وَالنَّهَارِ إِذَا تَجَلَّىٰ
english: and the day when it shines!

codes: ﮞ ﮟ ﮠ ﮡ ﮢ
text: وَمَا خَلَقَ الذَّكَرَ وَالْأُنثَىٰ
english: And by ˹the One˺ Who created male and female!

codes: ﮣ ﮤ ﮥ ﮦ
text: إِنَّ سَعْيَكُمْ لَشَتَّىٰ
english: Surely the ends you strive for are diverse.

codes: ﮧ ﮨ ﮩ ﮪ ﮫ
text: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أَعْطَىٰ وَاتَّقَىٰ
english: As for the one who is charitable, mindful ˹of Allah˺,

codes: ﮬ ﮭ ﮮ
text: وَصَدَّقَ بِالْحُسْنَىٰ
english: and ˹firmly˺ believes in the finest reward,

codes: ﮯ ﮰ ﮱ
text: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ
english: We will facilitate for them the Way of Ease.

codes: ﯓ ﯔ ﯕ ﯖ ﯗ
text: وَأَمَّا مَن بَخِلَ وَاسْتَغْنَىٰ
english: And as for the one who is stingy, indifferent ˹to Allah˺,

codes: ﯘ ﯙ ﯚ
text: وَكَذَّبَ بِالْحُسْنَىٰ
english: and ˹staunchly˺ denies the finest reward,

codes: ﯛ ﯜ ﯝ
text: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُ لِلْعُسْرَىٰ
english: We will facilitate for them the path of hardship.

codes: ﯞ ﯟ ﯠ ﯡ ﯢ ﯣ ﯤ
text: وَمَا يُغْنِي عَنْهُ مَالُهُ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰ
english: And their wealth will be of no benefit to them when they tumble ˹into Hell˺.

codes: ﯥ ﯦ ﯧ ﯨ
text: إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا لَلْهُدَىٰ
english: It is certainly upon Us ˹alone˺ to show ˹the way to˺ guidance.

codes: ﯩ ﯪ ﯫ ﯬ ﯭ
text: وَإِنَّ لَنَا لَلْآخِرَةَ وَالْأُولَىٰ
english: And surely to Us ˹alone˺ belong this life and the next.

codes: ﯮ ﯯ ﯰ ﯱ
text: فَأَنذَرْتُكُمْ نَارًا تَلَظَّىٰ
english: And so I have warned you of a raging Fire,

codes: ﭑ ﭒ ﭓ ﭔ ﭕ
text: لَا يَصْلَاهَا إِلَّا الْأَشْقَى
english: in which none will burn except the most wretched—

codes: ﭖ ﭗ ﭘ ﭙ
text: الَّذِي كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
english: who deny and turn away.

codes: ﭚ ﭛ ﭜ
text: وَسَيُجَنَّبُهَا الْأَتْقَى
english: But the righteous will be spared from it—

codes: ﭝ ﭞ ﭟ ﭠ ﭡ
text: الَّذِي يُؤْتِي مَالَهُ يَتَزَكَّىٰ
english: who donate ˹some of˺ their wealth only to purify themselves,

codes: ﭢ ﭣ ﭤ ﭥ ﭦ ﭧ ﭨ
text: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِندَهُ مِن نِّعْمَةٍ تُجْزَىٰ
english: not in return for someone’s favours,

codes: ﭩ ﭪ ﭫ ﭬ ﭭ ﭮ
text: إِلَّا ابْتِغَاءَ وَجْهِ رَبِّهِ الْأَعْلَىٰ
english: but seeking the pleasure of their Lord, the Most High.

codes: ﭯ ﭰ ﭱ
text: وَلَسَوْفَ يَرْضَىٰ
english: They will certainly be pleased.

codes: ﭲ ﭳ
text: وَالضُّحَىٰ
english: By the morning sunlight,

codes: ﭴ ﭵ ﭶ ﭷ
text: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا سَجَىٰ
english: and the night when it falls still!

codes: ﭸ ﭹ ﭺ ﭻ ﭼ ﭽ
text: مَا وَدَّعَكَ رَبُّكَ وَمَا قَلَىٰ
english: Your Lord ˹O Prophet˺ has not abandoned you, nor has He become hateful ˹of you˺.

codes: ﭾ ﭿ ﮀ ﮁ ﮂ ﮃ
text: وَلَلْآخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ لَّكَ مِنَ الْأُولَىٰ
english: And the next life is certainly far better for you than this one.

codes: ﮄ ﮅ ﮆ ﮇ ﮈ
text: وَلَسَوْفَ يُعْطِيكَ رَبُّكَ فَتَرْضَىٰ
english: And ˹surely˺ your Lord will give so much to you that you will be pleased.

codes: ﮉ ﮊ ﮋ ﮌ ﮍ
text: أَلَمْ يَجِدْكَ يَتِيمًا فَآوَىٰ
english: Did He not find you as an orphan then shelter you?

codes: ﮎ ﮏ ﮐ ﮑ
text: وَوَجَدَكَ ضَالًّا فَهَدَىٰ
english: Did He not find you unguided then guide you?

codes: ﮒ ﮓ ﮔ ﮕ
text: وَوَجَدَكَ عَائِلًا فَأَغْنَىٰ
english: And did He not find you needy then satisfy your needs?

codes: ﮖ ﮗ ﮘ ﮙ ﮚ
text: فَأَمَّا الْيَتِيمَ فَلَا تَقْهَرْ
english: So do not oppress the orphan,

codes: ﮛ ﮜ ﮝ ﮞ ﮟ
text: وَأَمَّا السَّائِلَ فَلَا تَنْهَرْ
english: nor repulse the beggar.

codes: ﮠ ﮡ ﮢ ﮣ ﮤ
text: وَأَمَّا بِنِعْمَةِ رَبِّكَ فَحَدِّثْ
english: And proclaim the blessings of your Lord.

codes: ﮥ ﮦ ﮧ ﮨ ﮩ
text: أَلَمْ نَشْرَحْ لَكَ صَدْرَكَ
english: Have We not uplifted your heart for you ˹O Prophet˺,

codes: ﮪ ﮫ ﮬ ﮭ
text: وَوَضَعْنَا عَنكَ وِزْرَكَ
english: relieved you of the burden

codes: ﮮ ﮯ ﮰ ﮱ
text: الَّذِي أَنقَضَ ظَهْرَكَ
english: which weighed so heavily on your back,

codes: ﯓ ﯔ ﯕ ﯖ
text: وَرَفَعْنَا لَكَ ذِكْرَكَ
english: and elevated your renown for you?

codes: ﯗ ﯘ ﯙ ﯚ ﯛ
text: فَإِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
english: So, surely with hardship comes ease.

codes: ﯜ ﯝ ﯞ ﯟ ﯠ
text: إِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
english: Surely with ˹that˺ hardship comes ˹more˺ ease.

codes: ﯡ ﯢ ﯣ ﯤ
text: فَإِذَا فَرَغْتَ فَانصَبْ
english: So once you have fulfilled ˹your duty˺, strive ˹in devotion˺,

codes: ﯥ ﯦ ﯧ ﯨ
text: وَإِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَارْغَب
english: turning to your Lord ˹alone˺ with hope.

codes: ﭑ ﭒ ﭓ
text: وَالتِّينِ وَالزَّيْتُونِ
english: By the fig and the olive ˹of Jerusalem˺,

codes: ﭔ ﭕ ﭖ
text: وَطُورِ سِينِينَ
english: and Mount Sinai,

codes: ﭗ ﭘ ﭙ ﭚ
text: وَهَٰذَا الْبَلَدِ الْأَمِينِ
english: and this secure city ˹of Mecca˺!

codes: ﭛ ﭜ ﭝ ﭞ ﭟ ﭠ ﭡ
text: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ فِي أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيمٍ
english: Indeed, We created humans in the best form.

codes: ﭢ ﭣ ﭤ ﭥ ﭦ
text: ثُمَّ رَدَدْنَاهُ أَسْفَلَ سَافِلِينَ
english: But We will reduce them to the lowest of the low ˹in Hell˺,

codes: ﭧ ﭨ ﭩ ﭪ ﭫ ﭬ ﭭ ﭮ ﭯ ﭰ
text: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ فَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ
english: except those who believe and do good—they will have a never-ending reward.

codes: ﭱ ﭲ ﭳ ﭴ ﭵ
text: فَمَا يُكَذِّبُكَ بَعْدُ بِالدِّينِ
english: Now, what makes you deny the ˹final˺ Judgment?

codes: ﭶ ﭷ ﭸ ﭹ ﭺ
text: أَلَيْسَ اللَّهُ بِأَحْكَمِ الْحَاكِمِينَ
english: Is Allah not the most just of all judges?

codes: ﭻ ﭼ ﭽ ﭾ ﭿ ﮀ
text: اقْرَأْ بِاسْمِ رَبِّكَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ
english: Read, ˹O Prophet,˺ in the Name of your Lord Who created—

codes: ﮁ ﮂ ﮃ ﮄ ﮅ
text: خَلَقَ الْإِنسَانَ مِنْ عَلَقٍ
english: created humans from a clinging clot.

codes: ﮆ ﮇ ﮈ ﮉ
text: اقْرَأْ وَرَبُّكَ الْأَكْرَمُ
english: Read! And your Lord is the Most Generous,

codes: ﮊ ﮋ ﮌ ﮍ
text: الَّذِي عَلَّمَ بِالْقَلَمِ
english: Who taught by the pen—

codes: ﮎ ﮏ ﮐ ﮑ ﮒ ﮓ
text: عَلَّمَ الْإِنسَانَ مَا لَمْ يَعْلَمْ
english: taught humanity what they knew not.

codes: ﮔ ﮕ ﮖ ﮗ ﮘ
text: كَلَّا إِنَّ الْإِنسَانَ لَيَطْغَىٰ
english: Most certainly, one exceeds all bounds

codes: ﮙ ﮚ ﮛ ﮜ
text: أَن رَّآهُ اسْتَغْنَىٰ
english: once they think they are self-sufficient.

codes: ﮝ ﮞ ﮟ ﮠ ﮡ
text: إِنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ الرُّجْعَىٰ
english: ˹But˺ surely to your Lord is the return ˹of all˺.

codes: ﮢ ﮣ ﮤ ﮥ
text: أَرَأَيْتَ الَّذِي يَنْهَىٰ
english: Have you seen the man who prevents

codes: ﮦ ﮧ ﮨ ﮩ
text: عَبْدًا إِذَا صَلَّىٰ
english: a servant ˹of Ours˺ from praying?

codes: ﮪ ﮫ ﮬ ﮭ ﮮ ﮯ
text: أَرَأَيْتَ إِن كَانَ عَلَى الْهُدَىٰ
english: What if this ˹servant˺ is ˹rightly˺ guided,

codes: ﮰ ﮱ ﯓ ﯔ
text: أَوْ أَمَرَ بِالتَّقْوَىٰ
english: or encourages righteousness?

codes: ﯕ ﯖ ﯗ ﯘ ﯙ
text: أَرَأَيْتَ إِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
english: What if that ˹man˺ persists in denial and turns away?

codes: ﯚ ﯛ ﯜ ﯝ ﯞ ﯟ
text: أَلَمْ يَعْلَم بِأَنَّ اللَّهَ يَرَىٰ
english: Does he not know that Allah sees ˹all˺?

codes: ﯠ ﯡ ﯢ ﯣ ﯤ ﯥ ﯦ
text: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمْ يَنتَهِ لَنَسْفَعًا بِالنَّاصِيَةِ
english: But no! If he does not desist, We will certainly drag him by the forelock—

codes: ﯧ ﯨ ﯩ ﯪ
text: نَاصِيَةٍ كَاذِبَةٍ خَاطِئَةٍ
english: a lying, sinful forelock.

codes: ﯫ ﯬ ﯭ
text: فَلْيَدْعُ نَادِيَهُ
english: So let him call his associates.

codes: ﯮ ﯯ ﯰ
text: سَنَدْعُ الزَّبَانِيَةَ
english: We will call the wardens of Hell.

codes: ﯱ ﯲ ﯳ ﯴ ﯵ ﯶ ﯷ
text: كَلَّا لَا تُطِعْهُ وَاسْجُدْ وَاقْتَرِب
english: Again, no! Never obey him ˹O Prophet˺! Rather, ˹continue to˺ prostrate and draw near ˹to Allah˺.

codes: ﭑ ﭒ ﭓ ﭔ ﭕ ﭖ
text: إِنَّا أَنزَلْنَاهُ فِي لَيْلَةِ الْقَدْرِ
english: Indeed, ˹It is˺ We ˹Who˺ sent this ˹Quran˺ down on the Night of Glory.

codes: ﭗ ﭘ ﭙ ﭚ ﭛ ﭜ
text: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا لَيْلَةُ الْقَدْرِ
english: And what will make you realize what the Night of Glory is?

codes: ﭝ ﭞ ﭟ ﭠ ﭡ ﭢ ﭣ
text: لَيْلَةُ الْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍ
english: The Night of Glory is better than a thousand months.

codes: ﭤ ﭥ ﭦ ﭧ ﭨ ﭩ ﭪ ﭫ ﭬ ﭭ
text: تَنَزَّلُ الْمَلَائِكَةُ وَالرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمْرٍ
english: That night the angels and the ˹holy˺ spirit descend, by the permission of their Lord, for every ˹decreed˺ matter.

codes: ﭮ ﭯ ﭰ ﭱ ﭲ ﭳ
text: سَلَامٌ هِيَ حَتَّىٰ مَطْلَعِ الْفَجْرِ
english: It is all peace until the break of dawn.

codes: ﭴ ﭵ ﭶ ﭷ ﭸ ﭹ ﭺ ﭻ ﭼ ﭽ ﭾ ﭿ ﮀ
text: لَمْ يَكُنِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنْ أَهْلِ الْكِتَابِ وَالْمُشْرِكِينَ مُنفَكِّينَ حَتَّىٰ تَأْتِيَهُمُ الْبَيِّنَةُ
english: The disbelievers from the People of the Book and the polytheists were not going to desist ˹from disbelief˺ until the clear proof came to them:

codes: ﮁ ﮂ ﮃ ﮄ ﮅ ﮆ ﮇ
text: رَسُولٌ مِّنَ اللَّهِ يَتْلُو صُحُفًا مُّطَهَّرَةً
english: a messenger from Allah, reciting scrolls of ˹utmost˺ purity,

codes: ﮈ ﮉ ﮊ ﮋ
text: فِيهَا كُتُبٌ قَيِّمَةٌ
english: containing upright commandments.

codes: ﮌ ﮍ ﮎ ﮏ ﮐ ﮑ ﮒ ﮓ ﮔ ﮕ ﮖ ﮗ
text: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ إِلَّا مِن بَعْدِ مَا جَاءَتْهُمُ الْبَيِّنَةُ
english: It was not until this clear proof came to the People of the Book that they became divided ˹about his prophethood˺—

codes: ﮘ ﮙ ﮚ ﮛ ﮜ ﮝ ﮞ ﮟ ﮠ ﮡ ﮢ ﮣ ﮤ ﮥ ﮦ ﮧ ﮨ ﮩ
text: وَمَا أُمِرُوا إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُوا اللَّهَ مُخْلِصِينَ لَهُ الدِّينَ حُنَفَاءَ وَيُقِيمُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَيُؤْتُوا الزَّكَاةَ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ دِينُ الْقَيِّمَةِ
english: even though they were only commanded to worship Allah ˹alone˺ with sincere devotion to Him in all uprightness, establish prayer, and pay alms-tax. That is the upright Way.

codes: ﮪ ﮫ ﮬ ﮭ ﮮ ﮯ ﮰ ﮱ ﯓ ﯔ ﯕ ﯖ ﯗ ﯘ ﯙ ﯚ ﯛ ﯜ
text: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنْ أَهْلِ الْكِتَابِ وَالْمُشْرِكِينَ فِي نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ أُولَٰئِكَ هُمْ شَرُّ الْبَرِيَّةِ
english: Indeed, those who disbelieve from the People of the Book and the polytheists will be in the Fire of Hell, to stay there forever. They are the worst of ˹all˺ beings.

codes: ﯝ ﯞ ﯟ ﯠ ﯡ ﯢ ﯣ ﯤ ﯥ ﯦ
text: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ أُولَٰئِكَ هُمْ خَيْرُ الْبَرِيَّةِ
english: Indeed, those who believe and do good—they are the best of ˹all˺ beings.

codes: ﭑ ﭒ ﭓ ﭔ ﭕ ﭖ ﭗ ﭘ ﭙ ﭚ ﭛ ﭜ ﭝ ﭞ ﭟ ﭠ ﭡ ﭢ ﭣ ﭤ ﭥ ﭦ ﭧ ﭨ
text: جَزَاؤُهُمْ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ جَنَّاتُ عَدْنٍ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا أَبَدًا ۖ رَّضِيَ اللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ وَرَضُوا عَنْهُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنْ خَشِيَ رَبَّهُ
english: Their reward with their Lord will be Gardens of Eternity, under which rivers flow, to stay there for ever and ever. Allah is pleased with them and they are pleased with Him. This is ˹only˺ for those in awe of their Lord.

codes: ﭩ ﭪ ﭫ ﭬ ﭭ
text: إِذَا زُلْزِلَتِ الْأَرْضُ زِلْزَالَهَا
english: When the earth is shaken ˹in˺ its ultimate quaking,

codes: ﭮ ﭯ ﭰ ﭱ
text: وَأَخْرَجَتِ الْأَرْضُ أَثْقَالَهَا
english: and when the earth throws out ˹all˺ its contents,

codes: ﭲ ﭳ ﭴ ﭵ ﭶ
text: وَقَالَ الْإِنسَانُ مَا لَهَا
english: and humanity cries, “What is wrong with it?”—

codes: ﭷ ﭸ ﭹ ﭺ
text: يَوْمَئِذٍ تُحَدِّثُ أَخْبَارَهَا
english: on that Day the earth will recount everything,

codes: ﭻ ﭼ ﭽ ﭾ ﭿ
text: بِأَنَّ رَبَّكَ أَوْحَىٰ لَهَا
english: having been inspired by your Lord ˹to do so˺.

codes: ﮀ ﮁ ﮂ ﮃ ﮄ ﮅ ﮆ
text: يَوْمَئِذٍ يَصْدُرُ النَّاسُ أَشْتَاتًا لِّيُرَوْا أَعْمَالَهُمْ
english: On that Day people will proceed in separate groups to be shown ˹the consequences of˺ their deeds.

codes: ﮇ ﮈ ﮉ ﮊ ﮋ ﮌ ﮍ
text: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًا يَرَهُ
english: So whoever does an atom’s weight of good will see it.

codes: ﮎ ﮏ ﮐ ﮑ ﮒ ﮓ ﮔ
text: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ شَرًّا يَرَهُ
english: And whoever does an atom’s weight of evil will see it.

codes: ﮕ ﮖ ﮗ
text: وَالْعَادِيَاتِ ضَبْحًا
english: ’ By the galloping, panting horses,

codes: ﮘ ﮙ ﮚ
text: فَالْمُورِيَاتِ قَدْحًا
english: striking sparks of fire ˹with their hoofs˺,

codes: ﮛ ﮜ ﮝ
text: فَالْمُغِيرَاتِ صُبْحًا
english: launching raids at dawn,

codes: ﮞ ﮟ ﮠ ﮡ
text: فَأَثَرْنَ بِهِ نَقْعًا
english: stirring up ˹clouds of˺ dust,

codes: ﮢ ﮣ ﮤ ﮥ
text: فَوَسَطْنَ بِهِ جَمْعًا
english: and penetrating into the heart of enemy lines!

codes: ﮦ ﮧ ﮨ ﮩ ﮪ
text: إِنَّ الْإِنسَانَ لِرَبِّهِ لَكَنُودٌ
english: Surely humankind is ungrateful to their Lord—

codes: ﮫ ﮬ ﮭ ﮮ ﮯ
text: وَإِنَّهُ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكَ لَشَهِيدٌ
english: and they certainly attest to this—

codes: ﮰ ﮱ ﯓ ﯔ ﯕ
text: وَإِنَّهُ لِحُبِّ الْخَيْرِ لَشَدِيدٌ
english: and they are truly extreme in their love of ˹worldly˺ gains.

codes: ﯖ ﯗ ﯘ ﯙ ﯚ ﯛ ﯜ ﯝ ﯞ
text: أَفَلَا يَعْلَمُ إِذَا بُعْثِرَ مَا فِي الْقُبُورِ
english: Do they not know that when the contents of the graves will be spilled out,

codes: ﭑ ﭒ ﭓ ﭔ ﭕ
text: وَحُصِّلَ مَا فِي الصُّدُورِ
english: and the secrets of the hearts will be laid bare—

codes: ﭖ ﭗ ﭘ ﭙ ﭚ ﭛ
text: إِنَّ رَبَّهُم بِهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ لَّخَبِيرٌ
