english: surely their Lord is All-Aware of them on that Day.

codes: ﭜ ﭝ
text: الْقَارِعَةُ
english: The Striking Disaster!

codes: ﭞ ﭟ ﭠ
text: مَا الْقَارِعَةُ
english: What is the Striking Disaster?

codes: ﭡ ﭢ ﭣ ﭤ ﭥ
text: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الْقَارِعَةُ
english: And what will make you realize what the Striking Disaster is?

codes: ﭦ ﭧ ﭨ ﭩ ﭪ ﭫ
text: يَوْمَ يَكُونُ النَّاسُ كَالْفَرَاشِ الْمَبْثُوثِ
english: ˹It is˺ the Day people will be like scattered moths,

codes: ﭬ ﭭ ﭮ ﭯ ﭰ
text: وَتَكُونُ الْجِبَالُ كَالْعِهْنِ الْمَنفُوشِ
english: and the mountains will be like carded wool.

codes: ﭱ ﭲ ﭳ ﭴ ﭵ
text: فَأَمَّا مَن ثَقُلَتْ مَوَازِينُهُ
english: So as for those whose scale is heavy ˹with good deeds˺,

codes: ﭶ ﭷ ﭸ ﭹ ﭺ
text: فَهُوَ فِي عِيشَةٍ رَّاضِيَةٍ
english: they will be in a life of bliss.

codes: ﭻ ﭼ ﭽ ﭾ ﭿ
text: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَفَّتْ مَوَازِينُهُ
english: And as for those whose scale is light,

codes: ﮀ ﮁ ﮂ
text: فَأُمُّهُ هَاوِيَةٌ
english: their home will be the abyss.

codes: ﮃ ﮄ ﮅ ﮆ ﮇ
text: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا هِيَهْ
english: And what will make you realize what that is?

codes: ﮈ ﮉ ﮊ
text: نَارٌ حَامِيَةٌ
english: ˹It is˺ a scorching Fire.

codes: ﮋ ﮌ ﮍ
text: أَلْهَاكُمُ التَّكَاثُرُ
english: Competition for more ˹gains˺ diverts you ˹from Allah˺,

codes: ﮎ ﮏ ﮐ ﮑ
text: حَتَّىٰ زُرْتُمُ الْمَقَابِرَ
english: until you end up in ˹your˺ graves.

codes: ﮒ ﮓ ﮔ ﮕ
text: كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
english: But no! You will soon come to know.

codes: ﮖ ﮗ ﮘ ﮙ ﮚ
text: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
english: Again, no! You will soon come to know.

codes: ﮛ ﮜ ﮝ ﮞ ﮟ ﮠ
text: كَلَّا لَوْ تَعْلَمُونَ عِلْمَ الْيَقِينِ
english: Indeed, if you were to know ˹your fate˺ with certainty, ˹you would have acted differently˺.

codes: ﮡ ﮢ ﮣ
text: لَتَرَوُنَّ الْجَحِيمَ
english: ˹But˺ you will surely see the Hellfire.

codes: ﮤ ﮥ ﮦ ﮧ ﮨ
text: ثُمَّ لَتَرَوُنَّهَا عَيْنَ الْيَقِينِ
english: Again, you will surely see it with the eye of certainty.

codes: ﮩ ﮪ ﮫ ﮬ ﮭ ﮮ
text: ثُمَّ لَتُسْأَلُنَّ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَنِ النَّعِيمِ
english: Then, on that Day, you will definitely be questioned about ˹your worldly˺ pleasures.

codes: ﭑ ﭒ
text: وَالْعَصْرِ
english: By the ˹passage of˺ time!

codes: ﭓ ﭔ ﭕ ﭖ ﭗ
text: إِنَّ الْإِنسَانَ لَفِي خُسْرٍ
english: Surely humanity is in ˹grave˺ loss,

codes: ﭘ ﭙ ﭚ ﭛ ﭜ ﭝ ﭞ ﭟ ﭠ ﭡ
text: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالْحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالصَّبْرِ
english: except those who have faith, do good, and urge each other to the truth, and urge each other to perseverance.

codes: ﭢ ﭣ ﭤ ﭥ ﭦ
text: وَيْلٌ لِّكُلِّ هُمَزَةٍ لُّمَزَةٍ
english: Woe to every backbiter, slanderer,

codes: ﭧ ﭨ ﭩ ﭪ ﭫ
text: الَّذِي جَمَعَ مَالًا وَعَدَّدَهُ
english: who amasses wealth ˹greedily˺ and counts it ˹repeatedly˺,

codes: ﭬ ﭭ ﭮ ﭯ ﭰ
text: يَحْسَبُ أَنَّ مَالَهُ أَخْلَدَهُ
english: thinking that their wealth will make them immortal!

codes: ﭱ ﭲ ﭳ ﭴ ﭵ ﭶ
text: كَلَّا ۖ لَيُنبَذَنَّ فِي الْحُطَمَةِ
english: Not at all! Such a person will certainly be tossed into the Crusher.

codes: ﭷ ﭸ ﭹ ﭺ ﭻ
text: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الْحُطَمَةُ
english: And what will make you realize what the Crusher is?

codes: ﭼ ﭽ ﭾ ﭿ
text: نَارُ اللَّهِ الْمُوقَدَةُ
english: ˹It is˺ Allah’s kindled Fire,

codes: ﮀ ﮁ ﮂ ﮃ ﮄ
text: الَّتِي تَطَّلِعُ عَلَى الْأَفْئِدَةِ
english: which rages over the hearts.

codes: ﮅ ﮆ ﮇ ﮈ
text: إِنَّهَا عَلَيْهِم مُّؤْصَدَةٌ
english: It will be sealed over them,

codes: ﮉ ﮊ ﮋ ﮌ
text: فِي عَمَدٍ مُّمَدَّدَةٍ
english: ˹tightly secured˺ with long braces.

codes: ﮍ ﮎ ﮏ ﮐ ﮑ ﮒ ﮓ ﮔ
text: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصْحَابِ الْفِيلِ
english: Have you not seen ˹O Prophet˺ how your Lord dealt with the Army of the Elephant?

codes: ﮕ ﮖ ﮗ ﮘ ﮙ ﮚ
text: أَلَمْ يَجْعَلْ كَيْدَهُمْ فِي تَضْلِيلٍ
english: Did He not frustrate their scheme?

codes: ﮛ ﮜ ﮝ ﮞ ﮟ
text: وَأَرْسَلَ عَلَيْهِمْ طَيْرًا أَبَابِيلَ
english: For He sent against them flocks of birds,

codes: ﮠ ﮡ ﮢ ﮣ ﮤ
text: تَرْمِيهِم بِحِجَارَةٍ مِّن سِجِّيلٍ
english: that pelted them with stones of baked clay,

codes: ﮥ ﮦ ﮧ ﮨ
text: فَجَعَلَهُمْ كَعَصْفٍ مَّأْكُولٍ
english: leaving them like chewed up straw.

codes: ﭑ ﭒ ﭓ
text: لِإِيلَافِ قُرَيْشٍ
english: ˹At least˺ for ˹the favour of˺ making Quraysh secure—

codes: ﭔ ﭕ ﭖ ﭗ ﭘ
text: إِيلَافِهِمْ رِحْلَةَ الشِّتَاءِ وَالصَّيْفِ
english: secure in their trading caravan ˹to Yemen˺ in the winter and ˹Syria˺ in the summer—

codes: ﭙ ﭚ ﭛ ﭜ ﭝ
text: فَلْيَعْبُدُوا رَبَّ هَٰذَا الْبَيْتِ
english: let them worship the Lord of this ˹Sacred˺ House,

codes: ﭞ ﭟ ﭠ ﭡ ﭢ ﭣ ﭤ ﭥ
text: الَّذِي أَطْعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٍ وَآمَنَهُم مِّنْ خَوْفٍ
english: Who has fed them against hunger and made them secure against fear.

codes: ﭦ ﭧ ﭨ ﭩ ﭪ
text: أَرَأَيْتَ الَّذِي يُكَذِّبُ بِالدِّينِ
english: Have you seen the one who denies the ˹final˺ Judgment?

codes: ﭫ ﭬ ﭭ ﭮ ﭯ
text: فَذَٰلِكَ الَّذِي يَدُعُّ الْيَتِيمَ
english: That is the one who repulses the orphan,

codes: ﭰ ﭱ ﭲ ﭳ ﭴ ﭵ
text: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ الْمِسْكِينِ
english: and does not encourage the feeding of the poor.

codes: ﭶ ﭷ ﭸ
text: فَوَيْلٌ لِّلْمُصَلِّينَ
english: So woe to those ˹hypocrites˺ who pray

codes: ﭹ ﭺ ﭻ ﭼ ﭽ ﭾ
text: الَّذِينَ هُمْ عَن صَلَاتِهِمْ سَاهُونَ
english: yet are unmindful of their prayers;

codes: ﭿ ﮀ ﮁ ﮂ
text: الَّذِينَ هُمْ يُرَاءُونَ
english: those who ˹only˺ show off,

codes: ﮃ ﮄ ﮅ
text: وَيَمْنَعُونَ الْمَاعُونَ
english: and refuse to give ˹even the simplest˺ aid.

codes: ﮆ ﮇ ﮈ ﮉ
text: إِنَّا أَعْطَيْنَاكَ الْكَوْثَرَ
english: Indeed, We have granted you ˹O Prophet˺ abundant goodness.

codes: ﮊ ﮋ ﮌ ﮍ
text: فَصَلِّ لِرَبِّكَ وَانْحَرْ
english: So pray and sacrifice to your Lord ˹alone˺.

codes: ﮎ ﮏ ﮐ ﮑ ﮒ
text: إِنَّ شَانِئَكَ هُوَ الْأَبْتَرُ
english: Only the one who hates you is truly cut off ˹from any goodness˺.

codes: ﭑ ﭒ ﭓ ﭔ
text: قُلْ يَا أَيُّهَا الْكَافِرُونَ
english: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “O you disbelievers!

codes: ﭕ ﭖ ﭗ ﭘ ﭙ
text: لَا أَعْبُدُ مَا تَعْبُدُونَ
english: I do not worship what you worship,

codes: ﭚ ﭛ ﭜ ﭝ ﭞ ﭟ
text: وَلَا أَنتُمْ عَابِدُونَ مَا أَعْبُدُ
english: nor do you worship what I worship.

codes: ﭠ ﭡ ﭢ ﭣ ﭤ ﭥ
text: وَلَا أَنَا عَابِدٌ مَّا عَبَدتُّمْ
english: I will never worship what you worship,

codes: ﭦ ﭧ ﭨ ﭩ ﭪ ﭫ
text: وَلَا أَنتُمْ عَابِدُونَ مَا أَعْبُدُ
english: nor will you ever worship what I worship.

codes: ﭬ ﭭ ﭮ ﭯ ﭰ
text: لَكُمْ دِينُكُمْ وَلِيَ دِينِ
english: You have your way, and I have my Way.”

codes: ﭱ ﭲ ﭳ ﭴ ﭵ ﭶ
text: إِذَا جَاءَ نَصْرُ اللَّهِ وَالْفَتْحُ
english: When Allah’s ˹ultimate˺ help comes and the victory ˹over Mecca is achieved˺,

codes: ﭷ ﭸ ﭹ ﭺ ﭻ ﭼ ﭽ ﭾ
text: وَرَأَيْتَ النَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ اللَّهِ أَفْوَاجًا
english: and you ˹O Prophet˺ see the people embracing Allah’s Way in crowds,

codes: ﭿ ﮀ ﮁ ﮂ ﮃ ﮄ ﮅ ﮆ ﮇ
text: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَاسْتَغْفِرْهُ ۚ إِنَّهُ كَانَ تَوَّابًا
english: then glorify the praises of your Lord and seek His forgiveness, for certainly He is ever Accepting of Repentance.

codes: ﮈ ﮉ ﮊ ﮋ ﮌ ﮍ
text: تَبَّتْ يَدَا أَبِي لَهَبٍ وَتَبَّ
english: May the hands of Abu Lahab perish, and he ˹himself˺ perish!

codes: ﮎ ﮏ ﮐ ﮑ ﮒ ﮓ ﮔ
text: مَا أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُ مَالُهُ وَمَا كَسَبَ
english: Neither his wealth nor ˹worldly˺ gains will benefit him.

codes: ﮕ ﮖ ﮗ ﮘ ﮙ
text: سَيَصْلَىٰ نَارًا ذَاتَ لَهَبٍ
english: He will burn in a flaming Fire,

codes: ﮚ ﮛ ﮜ ﮝ
text: وَامْرَأَتُهُ حَمَّالَةَ الْحَطَبِ
english: and ˹so will˺ his wife, the carrier of ˹thorny˺ kindling,

codes: ﮞ ﮟ ﮠ ﮡ ﮢ ﮣ
text: فِي جِيدِهَا حَبْلٌ مِّن مَّسَدٍ
english: around her neck will be a rope of palm-fibre.

codes: ﭑ ﭒ ﭓ ﭔ ﭕ
text: قُلْ هُوَ اللَّهُ أَحَدٌ
english: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “He is Allah—One ˹and Indivisible˺;

codes: ﭖ ﭗ ﭘ
text: اللَّهُ الصَّمَدُ
english: Allah—the Sustainer ˹needed by all˺.

codes: ﭙ ﭚ ﭛ ﭜ ﭝ
text: لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ
english: He has never had offspring, nor was He born.

codes: ﭞ ﭟ ﭠ ﭡ ﭢ ﭣ
text: وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُ كُفُوًا أَحَدٌ
english: And there is none comparable to Him.”

codes: ﭤ ﭥ ﭦ ﭧ ﭨ
text: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ الْفَلَقِ
english: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “I seek refuge in the Lord of the daybreak

codes: ﭩ ﭪ ﭫ ﭬ ﭭ
text: مِن شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
english: from the evil of whatever He has created,

codes: ﭮ ﭯ ﭰ ﭱ ﭲ ﭳ
text: وَمِن شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ
english: and from the evil of the night when it grows dark,

codes: ﭴ ﭵ ﭶ ﭷ ﭸ ﭹ
text: وَمِن شَرِّ النَّفَّاثَاتِ فِي الْعُقَدِ
english: and from the evil of those ˹witches casting spells by˺ blowing onto knots,

codes: ﭺ ﭻ ﭼ ﭽ ﭾ ﭿ
text: وَمِن شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ
english: and from the evil of an envier when they envy.”

codes: ﮀ ﮁ ﮂ ﮃ ﮄ
text: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ النَّاسِ
english: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “I seek refuge in the Lord of humankind,

codes: ﮅ ﮆ ﮇ
text: مَلِكِ النَّاسِ
english: the Master of humankind,

codes: ﮈ ﮉ ﮊ
text: إِلَٰهِ النَّاسِ
english: the God of humankind,

codes: ﮋ ﮌ ﮍ ﮎ ﮏ
text: مِن شَرِّ الْوَسْوَاسِ الْخَنَّاسِ
english: from the evil of the lurking whisperer—

codes: ﮐ ﮑ ﮒ ﮓ ﮔ ﮕ
text: الَّذِي يُوَسْوِسُ فِي صُدُورِ النَّاسِ
english: who whispers into the hearts of humankind—

codes: ﮖ ﮗ ﮘ ﮙ
text: مِنَ الْجِنَّةِ وَالنَّاسِ
english: from among jinn and humankind.
